[I]153-prince ivan am [no dreamer]2592-no dreamer ; [no speculator in aerial nothings]2593-no speculator in aerial nothings ; [no clever charlatan like [Casimir]152-zara , who , because [he]153-prince ivan is able to magnetize a dog , pretends to the same authority over [human beings]2284-human beings , and dares to risk the health , perhaps the very sanity , of [[his]153-prince ivan own sister]2350-his own sister , and that of [the unfortunate young musician whom [he]153-prince ivan has inveigled in here , all for the sake of proving [his]153-prince ivan dangerous , almost diabolical , experiments]2597-the unfortunate young musician whom he has inveigled in here , all for the sake of proving his dangerous , almost diabolical , experiments]2594-no clever charlatan like casimir , who , because he is able to magnetize a dog , pretends to the same authority over human beings , and dares to risk the health , perhaps the very sanity , of his own sister , and that of the unfortunate young musician whom he has inveigled in here , all for the sake of proving his dangerous , almost diabolical , experiments . Oh , yes ; [I]153-prince ivan see [you]152-zara are indignant , but [I]153-prince ivan speak truth . [I]153-prince ivan am [a plain man]2598-a plain man ; - and if [I]153-prince ivan am deficient in electric germs , as [Casimir]152-zara would say , [I]153-prince ivan have plenty of common sense . [I]153-prince ivan wish to rescue [you]152-zara , [Zara]152-zara . [You]152-zara are becoming a prey to morbid fancies ; [your]152-zara naturally healthy mind is full of extravagant notions concerning angels and demons and what not ; and [your]152-zara entire belief in , and enthusiasm for , [[your]152-zara brother]2260-your brother is a splendid advertisement for [him]2260-your brother . Let [me]153-prince ivan tear the veil of credulity from [your]152-zara eyes . Let [me]153-prince ivan teach [you]152-zara how good a thing it is to live and love and laugh like [other people]2386-other people , and leave electricity to the telegraph - wires and the lamp - posts . "[153-prince ivan]

Again [I]0-i heard the silken rustle of [Zara]152-zara 's dress , and , impelled by a strong curiosity and excitement , [I]0-i raised a corner of the curtain hanging over the door , and was able to see [the room]385-the room distinctly . [The Prince]708-the prince stood , or rather lounged , near the window , and opposite to [him]708-the prince was [Zara]152-zara ; [she]152-zara had evidently retreated from [him]708-the prince as far as possible , and held [herself]152-zara proudly erect , [her]152-zara eyes flashing with unusual brilliancy contrasted with the pallor of [her]152-zara face .

" [Your]708-the prince insults to [[my]152-zara brother]676-my brother , [Prince]153-prince ivan , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara said calmly , " [I]152-zara suffer to pass by [me]152-zara , knowing well to what a depth of wilful blind ignorance [you]153-prince ivan are fallen . [I]152-zara pity [you]153-prince ivan - and - [I]152-zara despise [you]153-prince ivan ! [You]153-prince ivan are indeed [a plain man]2598-a plain man , as [you]153-prince ivan say - nothing more and nothing less . [You]153-prince ivan can take advantage of the hospitality of [this house]2603-this house , and pretend friendship to [the host]2604-the host , while [you]153-prince ivan slander [him]2604-the host behind [his]2604-the host back , and insult [[his]2604-the host sister]2320-his sister in the privacy of [[her]2320-his sister own apartment]2606-her own apartment . Very manlike , truly ; and perfectly in accordance with [a reasonable being who likes to live and love and laugh according to the rule of society]2607-a reasonable being who likes to live and love and laugh according to the rule of society - a puppet whose wires society pulls , and [he]2604-the host dances or dies as society pleases . [I]152-zara told [you]153-prince ivan a gulf existed between [us]2608-us - [you]153-prince ivan have widened it , for which [I]152-zara thank [you]153-prince ivan ! As [I]152-zara do not impose any of [my]152-zara wishes upon [you]153-prince ivan , and therefore can not request [you]153-prince ivan to leave [the room]385-the room , [you]153-prince ivan must excuse [me]152-zara if [I]152-zara retire elsewhere . "[152-zara]

And [she]891-her approached the entrance of [[her]891-her studio]690-her studio , which was opposite to where [I]0-i stood ; but [the Prince]708-the prince reached it before [her]891-her , and placed [his]708-the prince back against it . [His]708-the prince face was deathly pale , and [his]708-the prince dark eyes blazed with wrath and love intermingled .

" No , [Zara]152-zara ! "[708-the prince] [he]708-the prince exclaimed in a sort of loud whisper . " If [you]152-zara think to escape [me]708-the prince so , [you]152-zara are in error . [I]708-the prince came to [you]152-zara reckless and resolved ! [You]152-zara shall be [mine]708-the prince if [I]708-the prince die for it ! "[708-the prince] And [he]708-the prince strove to seize [her]891-her in [his]708-the prince arms . But [she]891-her escaped [him]708-the prince and stood at bay , [her]891-her lips quivering , [her]891-her bosom heaving , and [her]891-her hands clenched .

" [I]891-her warn [you]708-the prince ! "[891-her] [she]891-her exclaimed . " By the intense loathing [I]891-her have for [you]152-zara ; by the force which makes [my]891-her spirit rise in arms against [you]152-zara , [I]891-her warn [you]152-zara ! Do not dare to touch [me]891-her ! If [you]152-zara care for [your]152-zara own life , leave [me]891-her while there is time ! "[891-her]

Never had [she]891-her looked so supremely , terribly beautiful . [I]0-i gazed at [her]891-her from [my]0-i corner of the doorway , awed , yet fascinated . The jewel on [her]891-her breast glowed with an angry red lustre , and shot forth dazzling opaline rays , as though it were a sort of living , breathing star . [Prince Ivan]153-prince ivan paused - entranced no doubt , as [I]0-i was , by [her]891-her unearthly loveliness . [His]153-prince ivan face flushed - [he]153-prince ivan gave a low laugh of admiration . Then [he]153-prince ivan made two swift strides forward and caught [her]891-her fiercely in [his]153-prince ivan embrace . [His]153-prince ivan triumph was brief . Scarcely had [his]153-prince ivan strong arm clasped [her]891-her waist , when it fell numb and powerless - scarcely had [his]153-prince ivan eager lips stooped towards [hers]891-her , when [he]153-prince ivan reeled and sank heavily on the ground , senseless ! The spell that had held [me]0-i a silent spectator of the scene was broken . Terrified , [I]0-i rushed into [the room]385-the room , crying out :

" [Zara]152-zara , [Zara]152-zara ! What have [you]152-zara done ? "[0-i]

[Zara]152-zara turned [her]152-zara eyes gently upon [me]0-i - they were soft and humid as though recently filled with tears . All the burning scorn and indignation had gone out of [her]152-zara face - [she]152-zara looked pityingly at the prostrate form of [[her]152-zara admirer]895-her admirer .

" [He]708-the prince is not dead , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara said quietly . " [I]152-zara will call [Casimir]152-zara . "[152-zara]

[I]0-i knelt beside [the Prince]708-the prince and raised [his]708-the prince hand . It was cold and heavy . [His]708-the prince lips were blue , and [his]708-the prince closed eyelids looked as though , in the words of [Homer]189-homer , " [Death]187-death 's purple finger "[189-homer] had shut them fast forever . No breath - no pulsation of the heart . [I]0-i looked fearfully at [Zara]152-zara . [She]152-zara smiled half sadly .

" [He]708-the prince is not dead , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara repeated .

" Are [you]152-zara sure ? "[0-i] [I]0-i murmured . " What was it , [Zara]152-zara , that made [him]708-the prince fall ? [I]0-i was at the door - [I]0-i saw and heard everything . "[0-i]

" [I]152-zara know [you]0-i did , "[152-zara] said [Zara]152-zara gently ; " and [I]152-zara am glad of it . [I]152-zara wished [you]152-zara to see and hear all . "[152-zara]

" Is it a fit , do [you]152-zara think ? "[0-i] [I]0-i asked again , looking sorrowfully at the sad face of [the unfortunate Ivan]897-the unfortunate ivan , which seemed to [me]0-i to have already graven upon it the stern sweet smile of [those who have passed all passion and pain forever]898-those who have passed all passion and pain forever . " Oh , [Zara]152-zara ! do [you]152-zara believe [he]708-the prince will recover ? "[0-i] And tears choked [my]0-i voice - tears of compassion and regret .

[Zara]152-zara came and kissed [me]0-i .

" Yes , [he]708-the prince will recover - do not fret , [little one]2610-little one . [I]152-zara have rung [my]152-zara private bell for [Casimir]152-zara ; [he]708-the prince will be [here]1773-here directly . [The Prince]708-the prince has had a shock - not a fatal one , as [you]0-i will see . [You]0-i look doubtful - are [you]0-i afraid of [me]152-zara , [dear]1876-dear ? "[152-zara]

[I]0-i gazed at [her]152-zara earnestly . Those clear childlike eyes - that frank smile - [that gentle and dignified mien]899-that gentle and dignified mien - could they accompany evil thoughts ? No ! [I]0-i was sure [Zara]152-zara was good as [she]152-zara was lovely .

" [I]0-i am not afraid of [you]152-zara , [Zara]152-zara , "[0-i] [I]0-i said gravely ; " [I]0-i love [you]152-zara too well for that . But [I]0-i am sorry for [the poor Prince]2614-the poor prince ; and [I]0-i can not understand - - "[0-i]

" [You]152-zara can not understand why [those who trespass against fixed laws]2615-those who trespass against fixed laws should suffer ? "[152-zara] observed [Zara]152-zara calmly . " Well , [you]152-zara will understand some day . [You]152-zara will know that in one way or another it is the reason of all suffering , both physical and mental , in [the world]264-the world . "[152-zara]

[I]0-i said no more , but waited in silence till the sound of a firm approaching footstep announced [Heliobas]104-heliobas . [He]104-heliobas entered [the room]385-the room quickly - glanced at the motionless form of [the Prince]708-the prince , then at [me]0-i , and lastly at [[his]104-heliobas sister]2320-his sister .

" Has [he]104-heliobas been long thus ? "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas asked in a low tone .

" Not five minutes , "[152-zara] replied [Zara]152-zara .

A pitying and affectionate gentleness of expression filled [his]104-heliobas keen eyes .

" [Reckless boy]2617-reckless boy ! "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas murmured softly , as [he]104-heliobas stooped and laid one hand lightly on [Ivan]153-prince ivan 's breast . " [He]104-heliobas is the very type of misguided human bravery . [You]0-i were too hard upon [him]104-heliobas , [Zara]152-zara ! "[104-heliobas]

[Zara]152-zara sighed .

" [He]104-heliobas spoke against [you]703-her brother , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara said . " Of course [he]104-heliobas did , "[703-her brother] returned [[her]152-zara brother]703-her brother with a smile . " And it was perfectly natural [he]104-heliobas should do so . Have [I]703-her brother not read [his]104-heliobas thoughts ? Do not [I]703-her brother know that [he]104-heliobas considers [me]703-her brother [a false pretender and CHARLATAN]2618-a false pretender and charlatan ? " [He]104-heliobas attempted to force [his]104-heliobas desires , "[152-zara] began [Zara]152-zara again , and [her]152-zara cheeks flushed indignantly .

" [I]703-her brother know , "[703-her brother] answered [[her]152-zara brother]703-her brother . " [I]703-her brother foresaw how it would be , but was powerless to prevent it . [He]104-heliobas was wrong - but bold ! Such boldness compels a certain admiration . [This fellow]2623-this fellow would scale the stars , if [he]104-heliobas knew how to do it , by physical force alone . "[703-her brother]

[I]0-i grew impatient , and interrupted these remarks .

" Perhaps [he]104-heliobas is scaling the stars now , "[0-i] [I]0-i said ; " or at any rate [he]104-heliobas will do so if death can show [him]104-heliobas the way . "[0-i]

[Heliobas]104-heliobas gave [me]0-i a friendly glance .

" [You]0-i also are growing courageous when [you]0-i can speak to [[your]0-i physician]2624-your physician thus abruptly , "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas observed quietly . " [Death]187-death has nothing to do with [[our]2625-our friend]2626-our friend as yet , [I]104-heliobas assure [you]0-i . [Zara]152-zara , [you]0-i had better leave [us]2625-our . [Your]0-i face must not be the first for [Ivan]153-prince ivan 's eyes to rest upon . [You]0-i , "[104-heliobas] nodding to [me]0-i , " can stay . "[104-heliobas]

[Zara]152-zara pressed [my]0-i hand gently as [she]152-zara passed [me]0-i , and entered [[her]152-zara studio]690-her studio , the door of which closed behind [her]152-zara , and [I]0-i heard the key turn in the lock . [I]0-i became absorbed in the proceedings of [Heliobas]104-heliobas . Stooping towards the recumbent form of [Prince Ivan]153-prince ivan , [he]104-heliobas took the heavy lifeless hands firmly in [his]104-heliobas own , and then fixed [his]104-heliobas eyes fully and steadily on the pale , set features with an expression of the most forcible calm and absolutely undeniable authority . Not one word did [he]104-heliobas utter , but remained motionless as a statue in the attitude thus assumed - [he]104-heliobas seemed scarcely to breathe - not a muscle of [his]104-heliobas countenance moved . Perhaps twenty or thirty seconds might have elapsed , when a warm tinge of colour came back to the apparently dead face - the brows twitched - the lips quivered and parted in a heavy sigh . The braised appearance of the eyelids gave place to the natural tint - they opened , disclosing the eyes , which stared directly into those of [the compelling Master who thus forced [their]907-their obedience]906-the compelling master who thus forced their obedience . A strong shudder shook [the young man]713-the young man 's frame ; [his]104-heliobas before nerveless hands grasped those of [Heliobas]104-heliobas with force and fervour , and still meeting that steady look which seemed to pierce the very centre of [his]104-heliobas system , [Prince Ivan]153-prince ivan , like [Lazarus of old]190-lazarus of old , arose and stood erect . As [he]104-heliobas did so , [Heliobas]104-heliobas withdrew [his]104-heliobas eyes , dropped [his]104-heliobas hands and smiled .

" [You]153-prince ivan are better , [Ivan]153-prince ivan ? "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas inquired kindly .

[The Prince]708-the prince looked about [him]713-the young man , bewildered . [He]708-the prince passed one hand across [his]708-the prince forehead without replying . Then [he]708-the prince turned slightly and perceived [me]0-i in the window - embrasure , whither [I]0-i had retreated in fear and wonderment at the marvellous power of [Heliobas]104-heliobas , thus openly and plainly displayed .

" Tell [me]708-the prince , "[708-the prince] [he]708-the prince said , addressing [me]0-i , " have [I]708-the prince been dreaming ? "[708-the prince]

[I]0-i could not answer [him]708-the prince . [I]0-i was glad to see [him]708-the prince recover , yet [I]0-i was a little afraid . [Heliobas]104-heliobas pushed a chair gently towards [him]708-the prince .

" Sit down , [Ivan]153-prince ivan , "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas said quietly .

[The Prince]708-the prince obeyed , and covered [his]708-the prince face with [his]708-the prince hand as though in deep and earnest meditation . [I]0-i looked on in silence and wonderment . [Heliobas]104-heliobas spoke not another word , and together [we]911-we watched [the pensive figure in the chair]912-the pensive figure in the chair , so absorbed in serious thought . Some minutes passed . The gentle tick of the clock in [the outer hall]913-the outer hall grew almost obtrusive , so loud did it seem in the utter stillness that surrounded [us]911-we . [I]0-i longed to speak - to ask questions - to proffer sympathy - but dared not move or utter a syllable . Suddenly [the Prince]708-the prince rose ; [his]708-the prince manner was calm and dignified , yet touched with a strange humility . [He]708-the prince advanced to [Heliobas]104-heliobas , holding out [his]708-the prince hand .

" Forgive [me]708-the prince , [Casimir]152-zara ! "[708-the prince] [he]708-the prince said simply .

[Heliobas]104-heliobas at once grasped the proffered palm within [his]104-heliobas own , and looked at [the young man]713-the young man with an almost fatherly tenderness .

" Say no more , [Ivan]153-prince ivan , "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas returned , [his]104-heliobas rich voice sounding more than usually mellow in its warmth and heartiness . " [We]911-we must all learn before [we]911-we can know , and some of [our]911-we lessons are sharp and difficult . "[104-heliobas]

" [You]152-zara shall not get angry with [ME]0-i , [Zara]152-zara . [I]0-i am not going to be treated like poor [Ivan]153-prince ivan . " [I]0-i can not say [I]0-i KNOW , "[0-i] [I]0-i went on boldly , still keeping [my]0-i arms round [her]152-zara ; " but [I]0-i have made a guess which [I]0-i think comes near the truth . [[Your]152-zara brother]2260-your brother has had the care of [you]152-zara ever since [you]152-zara were [a little child]2639-a little child , and [I]0-i believe [he]2260-your brother has , by some method known only to [himself]2260-your brother , charged [you]152-zara with electricity . Yes , [Zara]152-zara , "[0-i] for [she]152-zara had started and tried to loosen [my]0-i hold of [her]152-zara ; " and it is that which keeps [you]152-zara young and fresh as [a girl of sixteen]2640-a girl of sixteen , at an age when [other women]2220-other women lose [their]2220-other women bloom and grow wrinkles . It is that which gives [you]152-zara the power to impart a repelling shock to [people]1754-people [you]152-zara dislike , as in the case of [Prince Ivan]153-prince ivan . It is that which gives [you]152-zara such an attractive force for those with whom [you]152-zara have a little sympathy - such as [myself]152-zara , for instance ; and [you]152-zara can not , [Zara]152-zara , with all [your]152-zara electric strength , unclasp [my]152-zara arms from [your]152-zara waist , because [you]152-zara have not the sentiment of repulsion towards [me]152-zara which would enable [you]152-zara to do it . Shall [I]152-zara go on guessing ? "[152-zara]

[Zara]152-zara made a sign of assent - the expression of [her]152-zara face had softened , and a dimpling smile played round the corners of [her]152-zara mouth .

" [[Your]152-zara lover]2636-your lover , "[0-i] [I]0-i went on steadily and slowly , " is a native of some other sphere - perhaps a creation of [your]152-zara own fancy - perhaps for [I]0-i will not be sceptical any more [a beautiful and all - powerful angelic spirit]2644-a beautiful and all - powerful angelic spirit .
