[I]0-i readily consented , for [I]0-i [myself]0-i was desirous of passing a little time in solitude , in order to read the manuscripts [Heliobas]104-heliobas had given [me]0-i . " For , "[0-i] thought [I]0-i , " if there is anything in them not quite clear to [me]0-i , [he]104-heliobas will explain it , and [I]0-i had better take advantage of [his]104-heliobas instruction while [I]0-i can . "[0-i]

As [Zara]152-zara and [I]0-i went [upstairs]639-upstairs together , [we]1193-we were followed by [Leo]100-leo - a most unusual circumstance , as that faithful animal was generally in attendance on [[his]100-leo master]1772-his master . Now , however , [he]100-leo seemed to have something oppressive on [his]100-leo mind , for [he]100-leo kept close to [Zara]152-zara , and [his]100-leo big brown eyes , whenever [he]100-leo raised them to [her]152-zara face , were full of intense melancholy . [His]100-leo tail drooped in a forlorn way , and all the vivacity of [his]100-leo nature seemed to have gone out of [him]100-leo .

" [Leo]100-leo does not seem well , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , patting the dog 's beautiful silky coat , an attention to which [he]100-leo responded by a heavy sigh and a wistful gaze approaching to tears . [Zara]152-zara looked at [him]100-leo .

" [Poor [Leo]100-leo]2959-poor leo ! "[152-zara] [she]152-zara murmured caressingly . " Perhaps [he]100-leo feels lonely . Do [you]0-i want to come with [[your]0-i mistress]2960-your mistress to - day , [old boy]2266-old boy ? So [you]0-i shall . Come along - cheer up , [Leo]100-leo ! "[152-zara]

And , nodding to [me]0-i , [she]152-zara passed into [[her]152-zara studio]690-her studio , the dog following [her]152-zara . [I]0-i turned into [[my]0-i own apartment]1139-my own apartment , and then bethought [myself]0-i of the newspaper [Mrs. Everard]152-zara had thrust into [my]0-i pocket . It was a Roman journal , and the passage marked for [my]0-i perusal ran as follows :

" The picture of the Improvisatrice , painted by [[our]2962-our countryman]2963-our countryman [Signor Raffaello Cellini]97-cellini , has been purchased by [Prince N]205-prince n - - for the sum of forty thousand francs . [The Prince]708-the prince generously permits it to remain on view for a few days longer , so that [those who have not yet enjoyed its attraction]2965-those who have not yet enjoyed its attraction , have still time to behold one of the most wonderful pictures of the age . The colouring yet remains a marvel to both [students]2966-students and [connoisseurs]2967-connoisseurs , and the life - like appearance of [the girl]638-the girl 's figure , robed in its clinging white draperies ornamented with lilies of [the valley]477-the valley , is so strong , that [one]272-one imagines [she]638-the girl will step out of the canvas and confront [the bystanders]2971-the bystanders . [Signor Cellini]97-cellini must now be undoubtedly acknowledged as one of [the greatest geniuses of modern times]2972-the greatest geniuses of modern times . "[152-zara]

[I]0-i could see no reason , as [I]0-i perused this , to be sure that [I]0-i had served as the model for this successful work of art , unless the white dress and the lilies of [the valley]477-the valley , which [I]0-i had certainly worn at [Cannes]4-cannes , were sufficient authority for forming such a conclusion . Still [I]0-i felt quite a curiosity about the picture - the more so as [I]0-i could foresee no possible chance of [my]0-i ever beholding it . [I]0-i certainly should not go to [Rome]6-rome on purpose , and in a few days it would be in the possession of [Prince N]205-prince n - - , [a personage whom in all probability [I]0-i should never know]1198-a personage whom in all probability i should never know . [I]0-i put the newspaper carefully by , and then turned [my]0-i mind to the consideration of quite another subject - namely , the contents of [my]0-i parchment documents . The first one [I]0-i opened was that containing the private instructions of [Heliobas]104-heliobas to [myself]0-i for the preservation of [my]0-i own health , and the cultivation of the electric force within [me]0-i . These were so exceedingly simple , and yet so wonderful in their simplicity , that [I]0-i was surprised . They were based upon the plainest and most reasonable common - sense arguments - easy enough for [a child]369-a child to understand . Having promised never to make them public , it is impossible for [me]0-i to give the slightest hint of [their]1200-their purport ; but [I]0-i may say at once , without trespassing the bounds of [my]0-i pledged word , that if these few concise instructions were known and practised by [everyone]1821-everyone , [doctors]1202-doctors would be entirely thrown out of employment , and [[chemists]1203-chemists ' shops]1204-chemists ' shops would no longer cumber [the streets]1205-the streets . Illness would be very difficult of attainment - though in the event of its occurring [each individual]1206-each individual would know how to treat [him]1207-him or [herself]1208-herself - and life could be prolonged easily and comfortably to more than a hundred years , barring , of course , accidents by [sea]430-sea , rail and [road]1210-road , or by deeds of violence . But it will take many generations before [the world]264-the world is UNIVERSALLY self - restrained enough to follow such plain maxims as those laid down for [me]0-i in the writing of [[my]0-i benefactor]1212-my benefactor , [Heliobas]104-heliobas - even if it be ever self - restrained at all , which , judging from the present state of society , is much to be doubted . Therefore , no more of the subject , on which , indeed , [I]0-i am forbidden to speak .

The other document , called " The Electric Principle of Christianity , "[0-i] [I]0-i found so curious and original , suggesting so many new theories concerning that religion which has civilized a great portion of humanity , that , as [I]0-i am not restrained by any promise on this point , [I]0-i have resolved to give it here in full . [[My]0-i readers]1213-my readers must not be rash enough to jump to the conclusion that [I]0-i set it forward as an explanation or confession of [my]0-i own faith ; [my]0-i creed has nothing to do with [anyone]2062-anyone save [myself]0-i . [I]0-i simply copy the manuscript [I]0-i possess , as the theory of [a deeply read and widely intelligent man , such as [Heliobas]104-heliobas undoubtedly WAS and IS]1215-a deeply read and widely intelligent man , such as heliobas undoubtedly was and is ; [a man]278-a man , too , in whose veins runs the blood of [the Chaldean kings]2275-the chaldean kings - [earnest and thoughtful Orientals , who were far wiser in [their]1218-earnest and thoughtful orientals , who were far wiser in their generation generation]1218-earnest and thoughtful orientals , who were far wiser in their generation perhaps than [we]1219-ours , with all [our]1219-ours boasted progress , are in [ours]1219-ours . The coincidences which have to do with electrical science will , [I]0-i believe , be generally admitted to be curious if not convincing . To [me]0-i , of course , they are only fresh proofs of WHAT [I]0-i KNOW , because [I]0-i HAVE SEEN THE GREAT ELECTRIC CIRCLE , and know [its]1220-its power guided as it is by the Central Intelligence within to be capable of anything , from the sending down of a minute spark of instinct into the heart of a flower , to the perpetual manufacture and re - absorption of solar systems by the million million . And it is a circle that ever widens without end . What more glorious manifestation can there be of [the Creator]2447-the creator 's splendour and wisdom ! But as to how [this world of]1222-this world of [ours]1219-ours span round in [its]1222-this world of own light littleness farther and farther from the Radiant Ring , till [its]1222-this world of very Sun began to be re - absorbed , and till [its]1222-this world of Moon disappeared and became a mere picture - till it became of itself like a small blot on the fair scroll of [the Universe]1-the universe , while [[its]1222-this world of inhabitants]2722-its inhabitants grew to resent all heavenly attraction ; and how it was yet thought worth [God]101-god 's patience and tender consideration , just for the sake of [a few human souls upon [it]1222-this world of who still remembered and loved [Him]101-god]1224-a few human souls upon it who still remembered and loved him , to give [it]1222-this world of one more chance before it should be drawn back into the Central Circle like a spark within a fire - all this is sufficiently set forth in the words of [Heliobas]104-heliobas , quoted in the next chapter .

CHAPTER XIV .

THE ELECTRIC CREED .

The " Electric Principle of Christianity "[104-heliobas] opened as follows :

" From all Eternity [God]101-god , or [the SUPREME SPIRIT OF LIGHT]2973-the supreme spirit of light , existed , and to all Eternity [He]101-god will continue to exist . This is plainly stated in the New Testament thus : ' [God]101-god is [a SPIRIT]2974-a spirit , and [they]2975-they that worship [Him]101-god must worship [Him]101-god IN SPIRIT and in truth . '[104-heliobas]

" [He]101-god is a Shape of pure Electric Radiance . [Those who may be inclined to doubt this]2976-those who may be inclined to doubt this may search the Scriptures on which [they]2976-those who may be inclined to doubt this pin [their]2976-those who may be inclined to doubt this faith , and [they]2976-those who may be inclined to doubt this will find that all the visions and appearances of [the Deity there]2977-the deity there chronicled were electric in character .[104-heliobas]

" As [a poet]2427-a poet forms poems , or [a musician]1797-a musician melodies , so [God]101-god formed by a Thought [the Vast Central Sphere in which [He]101-god dwells]2980-the vast central sphere in which he dwells , and peopled it with the pure creations of [His]101-god glorious fancy . And why ? Because , being pure Light , [He]101-god is also pure Love ; the power or capacity of Love implies the necessity of Loving ; the necessity of loving points to the existence of things to be loved - hence the secret of creation . From the ever - working Intelligence of this Divine Love proceeded [the Electric Circle of [the Universe]1-the universe]2981-the electric circle of the universe , from whence are born [all worlds]2684-all worlds .[104-heliobas]

" This truth vaguely dawned upon [the ancient poets of Scripture]2983-the ancient poets of scripture when [they]2983-the ancient poets of scripture wrote : ' Darkness was upon the face of the deep . [And the Spirit of God]2984-and the spirit of god moved upon the face of [the waters]2985-the waters . And [God]101-god said , Let there be light . And there was light . '[104-heliobas]

" These words apply SOLELY to the creation or production of [[OUR]2986-our OWN EARTH]2987-our own earth , and in them [we]2986-our read nothing but a simple manifestation of electricity , consisting in a HEATING PASSAGE OF RAYS from the Central Circle to [the planet newly propelled forth from it , which caused [that planet]2824-that planet to produce and multiply the wonders of the animal , vegetable , and mineral kingdoms which [we]2986-our call Nature]2988-the planet newly propelled forth from it , which caused that planet to produce and multiply the wonders of the animal , vegetable , and mineral kingdoms which we call nature .[104-heliobas]

" Let [us]2986-our now turn again to [the poet - prophets of Scripture]2990-the poet - prophets of scripture : ' And [God]101-god said , Let [us]2986-our make [man]282-man in [our]2986-our image . ' The word ' [OUR]2986-our ' here implies an instinctive idea that [God]101-god was never alone . This idea is correct . Love can not exist in a chaos ; and [God]101-god by the sheer necessity of [His]101-god Being has for ever been surrounded by radiant and immortal Spirits emanating from [His]101-god own creative glory - [beings in whom all beauty and all purity are found]2992-beings in whom all beauty and all purity are found . In the IMAGES , therefore only the IMAGES , of [these Children of Light]2993-these children of light and of [Himself]101-god , [He]101-god made [Man]180-man - that is , [He]101-god caused [the Earth]38-the earth to be inhabited and DOMINATED by beings composed of Earth 's component parts , animal , vegetable , and mineral , giving [them]2993-these children of light [their]2993-these children of light superiority by placing within [them]2993-these children of light [His]101-god ' LIKENESS ' in the form of an ELECTRIC FLAME or GERM of spiritual existence combined with its companion working - force of WILL - POWER .[104-heliobas]

" Like all flames , this electric spark can either be fanned into a fire or it can be allowed to escape in air - [IT]2994-it CAN NEVER BE DESTROYED . [It]2994-it can be fostered and educated till it becomes [a living Spiritual Form of absolute beauty]2995-a living spiritual form of absolute beauty - [an immortal creature of thought , memory , emotion , and working intelligence]2996-an immortal creature of thought , memory , emotion , and working intelligence . If , on the contrary , [he]101-god is neglected or forgotten , and its companion Will is drawn by the weight of Earth to work for earthly aims alone , then it escapes and seeks other chances of development in OTHER FORMS on [OTHER PLANETS]59-other planets , while the body [it]2994-it leaves , SUPPORTED ONLY BY PHYSICAL SUSTENANCE DRAWN FROM [THE EARTH]38-the earth ON WHICH IT DWELLS , becomes a mere lump of clay ANIMATED BY MERE ANIMAL LIFE SOLELY , full of inward ignorance and corruption and outward incapacity . Of such material are the majority of men composed BY [THEIR]2993-these children of light OWN FREE - WILL AND CHOICE , because [they]2993-these children of light habitually deaden the voice of conscience and refuse to believe in the existence of a spiritual element within and around [them]2993-these children of light .[104-heliobas]

" To resume : [the Earth]38-the earth is [one of the smallest of planets]2997-one of the smallest of planets ; and not only this , but , from [its]38-the earth position in [the Universe]2474-the universe , receives a less amount of direct influence from the Electric Circle than [other worlds more happily situated]2999-other worlds more happily situated . Were [men]273-men wise enough to accept this fact , [they]273-men would foster to the utmost the germs of electric sympathy within [themselves]273-men , in order to form a direct communication , or system of attraction , between [this planet]1811-this planet and [the ever - widening Ring]3002-the ever - widening ring , so that some spiritual benefit might accrue to [them]273-men thereby . But as the ages roll on , [their]273-men chances of doing this diminish . The time is swiftly approaching when the invincible Law of Absorption shall extinguish [Earth]38-the earth as easily as [we]3003-we blow out the flame of a candle . True , it may be again reproduced , and again thrown out on [space]3004-space ; but then it will be in a new and grander form , and will doubtless have [more godlike inhabitants]3005-more godlike inhabitants .[104-heliobas]

" In the meantime - during those brief cycles of centuries which are as a breath in the workings of [the Infinite]60-the infinite , and which must yet elapse before [this world]1957-this world , as [we]3003-we know it , comes to an end - [God]101-god has taken pity on [the few , very few souls dwelling here , pent up in mortal clay , who have blindly tried to reach [Him]101-god , like plants straining up to the light , and has established a broad stream of sympathetic electric communication with [Himself]101-god , which [all who care to do so]3008-all who care to do so may avail [themselves]3008-all who care to do so of]3007-the few , very few souls dwelling here , pent up in mortal clay , who have blindly tried to reach him , like plants straining up to the light , and has established a broad stream of sympathetic electric communication with himself , which all who care to do so may avail themselves of .[104-heliobas]

" Here it may be asked : Why should [God]101-god take pity ? Because that Supreme Shape of Light finds a portion of [Himself]101-god in all pure souls that love [Him]101-god , and [HE]101-god CANNOT DESPISE [HIMSELF]101-god . Also because [He]101-god is capable of all the highest emotions known to [man]282-man , in a far larger and grander degree , besides possessing other sentiments and desires unimaginable to [the human mind]3010-the human mind . It is enough to say that all the attributes that accompany perfect goodness [He]101-god enjoys ; therefore [He]101-god can feel compassion , tenderness , forgiveness , patience - all or any of the emotions that produce pure , unselfish pleasure .[104-heliobas]

" Granting [Him]101-god , therefore , these attributes and it is both blasphemous and unreasonable to DENY [HIM]101-god THOSE VIRTUES WHICH DISTINGUISH THE BEST OF [MEN]206-men , it is easily understood how [He]101-god , the All - Fair Beneficent Ruler of [the Central Sphere]55-the central sphere , perceiving the long distance to which [the Earth]374-the earth was propelled , like a ball flung too far out , from the glory of [His]101-god Electric Ring , saw also that the creatures [He]101-god had made in [His]101-god image were in danger of crushing that image completely out , and with it all remembrance of [Him]101-god , in the fatal attention [they]3012-they gave to [their]3012-they merely earthly surroundings , lacking , as [they]3012-they did , and not possessing sufficient energy to seek , electric attraction . In brief , [this Earth]38-the earth and [[God]101-god 's World]2685-god 's world were like [America]62-america and [Europe]26-europe before [the Atlantic Cable]63-the atlantic cable was laid . Now the messages of goodwill flash under the waves , heedless of the storms . So also [God]101-god 's Cable is laid between [us]3014-us and [[His]101-god Heaven]3015-his heaven in the person of [Christ]101-god .[104-heliobas]

" For ages always remembering that [our]3014-us ages are with [God]101-god a moment the idea of WORSHIP was in the mind of [man]282-man . With this idea came also the sentiment of PROPITIATION . [The untamed savage]3017-the untamed savage has from time immemorial instinctively felt the necessity of looking up to a Being greater than [Himself]3017-the untamed savage , and also of seeking a reconciliation with that Being for some fault or loss in [himself]3017-the untamed savage which [he]3017-the untamed savage is aware of , yet can not explain . This double instinct - worship and propitiation - is the key - note of all the creeds of [the world]264-the world , and may be called [God]101-god 's first thought of the cable to be hereafter laid - a lightning - thought which [He]101-god instilled into [the human race]3019-the human race to prepare it , as one might test a telegraph - wire from [house]3020-house to [house]3020-house , before stretching it across [a continent]3022-a continent .[104-heliobas]

" All religions , as known to [us]3014-us , are mere types of Christianity . It is a notable fact that [some of the oldest and most learned races in [the world]264-the world]3023-some of the oldest and most learned races in the world , such as [the Armenians and Chaldeans]3025-the armenians and chaldeans , were the first to be convinced of the truth of [Christ]101-god 's visitation . Buddhism , of which there are [so many million followers]3026-so many million followers , is itself a type of [Christ]101-god 's teaching ; only it lacks the supernatural element . [Buddha]207-buddha died [a hermit]3027-a hermit at the age of eighty , as [any wise and ascetic man]3028-any wise and ascetic man might do to - day . The death and resurrection of [Christ]101-god were widely different . [Anyone]2062-anyone can be [a Buddha]3030-a buddha again ; [anyone]2062-anyone can NOT be [a Christ]3032-a christ . That there are stated to be more [followers of Buddhism than of Christianity]3033-followers of buddhism than of christianity is no proof of any efficacy in the former or lack of power in the latter . [Buddhists]3034-buddhists help to swell that very large class of [persons who prefer a flattering picture to a plain original]3035-persons who prefer a flattering picture to a plain original ; or who , sheep - like by nature , finding [themselves]3034-buddhists all together in [one meadow]3036-one meadow , are too lazy , as well as too indifferent , to seek pastures fresher and fairer .[104-heliobas]

" Through the divine influence of an Electric Thought , then , [the world]264-the world unconsciously grew to expect SOMETHING - [they]264-the world knew not what . The old creeds of [the world]264-the world , like sunflowers , turned towards that unknown Sun ; [the poets]2470-the poets , [prophets]2476-prophets , [seers]3041-seers , all spoke of some approaching consolation and glory ; and to this day [the fated Jews]3042-the fated jews expect it , unwilling to receive as [[their]3042-the fated jews Messiah]3043-their messiah the Divine Martyr [they]3042-the fated jews slew , though [their]3042-the fated jews own Scriptures testify to [His]3032-a christ identity .[104-heliobas]

" [Christ]101-god came , born of [a Virgin]3044-a virgin ; that is , [a radiant angel from [God]101-god 's Sphere]3045-a radiant angel from god 's sphere was in the first place sent down to Earth to wear the form of Mary of [Bethlehem]64-bethlehem , in [Judea]65-judea . Within [that vessel of absolute purity]3046-that vessel of absolute purity [God]101-god placed an Emanation of [His]101-god own radiance - no germ or small flame such as is given to [us]3047-us in [our]3047-us bodies to cultivate and foster , but a complete immortal Spirit , a portion of [God]101-god [Himself]101-god , wise , sinless , and strong . [This Spirit , pent up in clay]3048-this spirit , pent up in clay , was born as [a helpless babe]3049-a helpless babe , grew up as [man]282-man - as [man]282-man taught , comforted , was slain and buried ; but as [pure Spirit]196-spirit rose again and returned in peace to Heaven , [His]101-god mission done .[104-heliobas]

" It was necessary , in order to establish what has been called an electric communication between [[God]101-god 's Sphere]3052-god 's sphere and [this Earth]2485-this earth , that [an actual immortal , untainted Spirit in the person of Christ]3054-an actual immortal , untainted spirit in the person of christ should walk [this world]1957-this world , sharing with [men]273-men sufferings , difficulties , danger , and death . Why ? In order that [we]3047-us might first completely confide in and trust [Him]101-god , afterwards realizing [His]101-god spiritual strength and glory by [His]101-god resurrection . And here may be noted the main difference between the Electric Theory of Christianity and other theories . [CHRIST]101-god DID NOT DIE BECAUSE [GOD]101-god NEEDED A SACRIFICE . The idea of sacrifice is a relic of heathen barbarism ; [God]101-god is too infinitely loving to desire the sacrifice of the smallest flower . [He]101-god is too patient to be ever wrathful ; and barbaric ignorance confronts [us]3047-us again in the notion that [He]101-god should need to be appeased . And the fancy that [He]101-god should desire [Himself]101-god or part of [Himself]101-god to become a sacrifice to [Himself]101-god has arisen out of the absurd and conflicting opinions of erring humanity , wherein right and wrong are so jumbled together that it is difficult to distinguish one from the other . [Christ]101-god 's death was not a sacrifice ; it was simply a means of confidence and communion with [the Creator]2447-the creator . [A sinless Spirit]3058-a sinless spirit suffered to show [us]3047-us how to suffer ; lived on [earth]1946-earth to show [us]3047-us how to live ; prayed to show [us]3047-us how to pray ; died to show [us]3047-us how to die ; rose again to impress strongly upon [us]3047-us that there was in truth a life beyond this one , for which [He]101-god strove to prepare [our]3047-us souls . Finally , by [His]101-god re - ascension into [Heaven]2721-heaven [He]101-god established that much - needed electric communication between [us]3047-us and [the Central Sphere]3061-the central sphere .[104-heliobas]

" It can be proved from the statements of the New Testament that in [Christ]101-god was [an Embodied Electric Spirit]3062-an embodied electric spirit . From first to last [His]101-god career was attended by ELECTRIC PHENOMENA , of which eight examples are here quoted ; and [earnest students of the matter]3063-earnest students of the matter can find many others if [they]3063-earnest students of the matter choose to examine for [themselves]3063-earnest students of the matter .[104-heliobas]

" 1 . The appearance of the Star and the Vision of [Angels]198-the angels on the night of [His]101-god birth . [The Chaldeans]135-the chaldeans saw [His]101-god ' star in the east , ' and [they]135-the chaldeans came to worship [Him]101-god . [The Chaldeans]135-the chaldeans were always [a learned people]3064-a learned people , and electricity was an advanced science with [them]135-the chaldeans . [They]135-the chaldeans at once recognized the star to be [no new planet]3065-no new planet , but simply a star - shaped flame flitting through space . [They]135-the chaldeans knew what this meant . Observe , too , that [they]135-the chaldeans had no doubts upon the point ; [they]135-the chaldeans came ' to worship [him]101-god , ' and provided [themselves]135-the chaldeans with gifts to offer to [this radiant Guest]3066-this radiant guest , [the offspring of pure Light]3067-the offspring of pure light . The vision of the angels appearing to [the shepherds]3068-the shepherds was simply a joyous band of [the Singing Children of the Electric Ring , who out of pure interest and pleasure]3069-the singing children of the electric ring , who out of pure interest and pleasure floated in sight of [Earth]38-the earth , drawn thither partly by the already strong attractive influence of the Radiance that was imprisoned [there in the form of]3070-there in the form of [the Babe of Bethlehem]208-the babe of bethlehem .[104-heliobas]

" 2 . When [Christ]101-god was baptized by [John the Baptist]209-john , ' THE HEAVENS OPENED . '[104-heliobas]

" 3 . The sympathetic influence of [Christ]101-god was so powerful that when [He]101-god selected [[His]101-god disciples]2655-his disciples , [He]101-god had but to speak to [them]2655-his disciples , and at the sound of [His]101-god voice , though [they]2655-his disciples were engaged in other business , ' [THEY]2655-his disciples LEFT ALL AND FOLLOWED [HIM]101-god . "[104-heliobas]

" 4 . [Christ]101-god 's body was charged with electricity . Thus [He]101-god was easily able to heal [sick and diseased persons]3072-sick and diseased persons by a touch or a look . [The woman who caught at [His]101-god garment in [the crowd]286-the crowd]3073-the woman who caught at his garment in the crowd was cured of [her]3073-the woman who caught at his garment in the crowd long - standing ailment ; and [we]3075-we see that [Christ]101-god was aware of [His]101-god own electric force by the words [He]101-god used on that occasion : ' WHO TOUCHED [ME]104-heliobas ? FOR [I]104-heliobas FEEL THAT SOME VIRTUE IS GONE OUT OF [ME]104-heliobas ' - which is the exact feeling that [a physical electrician]2121-a physical electrician experiences at this day after employing [his]2121-a physical electrician powers on a subject . The raising of [[Jairus]210-jairus 's daughter]3077-jairus 's daughter , of [[the widow]3078-the widow 's son]3079-the widow 's son at [Nain]66-nain , and of [Lazarus]190-lazarus of old , were all accomplished by the same means .[104-heliobas]

" 5 . The walking on [the sea]1792-the sea was a purely electric effort , AND CAN BE ACCOMPLISHED NOW BY [ANYONE who has cultivated sufficient inner force]3081-anyone who has cultivated sufficient inner force . [The sea]1792-the sea being full of electric particles will support [anybody]2324-anybody sufficiently and similarly charged - the two currents combining to procure the necessary equilibrium . [Peter]211-peter , who was able to walk a little way , lost [his]211-peter power directly [his]211-peter will became vanquished by fear - because the sentiment of fear disperses electricity , and being purely HUMAN emotion , does away with spiritual strength for the time .[104-heliobas]

" 6 . The Death of [Christ]101-god was attended by electric manifestations - by the darkness over [the land]3084-the land during the Crucifixion ; the tearing of the temple veil in twain ; and the earthquake which finally ensued .[104-heliobas]

" 7 . The Resurrection was a most powerful display of electric force . It will be remembered that [the angel who was found sitting at the entrance of the empty sepulchre]3085-the angel who was found sitting at the entrance of the empty sepulchre ' had a countenance like LIGHTNING , ' i.e. , like electric flame . It must also be called to mind how [the risen Christ]3086-the risen christ addressed [Mary Magdalene]212-mary magdalene : ' TOUCH [ME]104-heliobas NOT , for [I]104-heliobas am but newly risen ! ' Why should [she]212-mary magdalene not have touched [Him]101-god ? Simply because [His]101-god strength then was the strength of concentrated in - rushing currents of electricity ; and to touch [him]101-god at that moment would have been for [Magdalene]212-mary magdalene instant death by lightning . This effect of embodied electric force has been shadowed forth in the Greek legends of [Apollo]213-apollo , whose glory consumed at a breath [the mortal who dared to look upon]3087-the mortal who dared to look upon [him]101-god .[104-heliobas]

" 8 . The descent of [the Holy Ghost]3088-the holy ghost , by which term is meant an ever - flowing current of the inspired working Intelligence of [the Creator]2447-the creator , was purely electric in character : ' Suddenly there came a sound from Heaven as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled [all the house where [they]3090-all the house where they were sitting were sitting]3090-all the house where they were sitting . And there appeared unto [them]3090-all the house where they were sitting CLOVEN TONGUES LIKE AS OF FIRE , and sat upon each of [them]3090-all the house where they were sitting . ' It may here be noted that the natural electric flame is DUAL or ' cloven ' in shape .[104-heliobas]

" Let [us]3091-our now take the Creed as accepted to - day by [the Christian Church]3092-the christian church , and see how thoroughly it harmonizes with the discoveries of spiritual electricity . ' [I]104-heliobas believe in [one God]3093-one god [the Father Almighty]3094-the father almighty , Maker of Heaven and Earth , and of all things VISIBLE AND INVISIBLE . ' This is a brief and simple description of [the Creator]2447-the creator as [He]2447-the creator exists - a Supreme Centre of Light , out of whom MUST spring all life , all love , all wisdom .[104-heliobas]

" ' And in one [Lord Jesus Christ]214-lord jesus christ , [the only begotten Son of God]3096-the only begotten son of god , born of [the Father before all ages]3097-the father before all ages . ' This means that the only absolute Emanation of [His]214-lord jesus christ own PERSONAL Radiance that ever wore such mean garb as [our]3091-our clay was found in [Christ]214-lord jesus christ - who , as part of [God]101-god , certainly existed ' BEFORE ALL AGES . ' For as the Creed itself says , [He]214-lord jesus christ was ' [God of [God]101-god]3098-god of god , LIGHT OF LIGHT . Then [we]3091-our go on through the circumstances of [Christ]101-god 's birth , life , death , and resurrection , and [our]3091-our profession of faith brings [us]3091-our to ' [I]104-heliobas believe in [the Holy Ghost]3088-the holy ghost , [the Lord and Giver of Life]3100-the lord and giver of life , who proceedeth from [the Father]3101-the father and [the Son]3102-the son , ' etc . This , as already stated , means that [we]3091-our believe that since [Christ]101-god ascended into [Heaven]2721-heaven , [our]3091-our electric communication with [the Creator]215-the creator has been established , and an ever - flowing current of divine inspiration is turned beneficially in the direction of [[our]3091-our Earth]1125-our earth , ' proceeding from [the Father and the Son]3105-the father and the son . ' [We]3091-our admit in the Creed that this inspiration manifested itself before [Christ]101-god came and ' SPAKE BY [THE PROPHETS]2480-the prophets ; ' but , as before stated , this only happened at rare and difficult intervals , while now [Christ]101-god [Himself]101-god speaks through [those who most strongly adhere to [His]101-god teachings]3107-those who most strongly adhere to his teachings .[104-heliobas]

" It may here be mentioned that [few]275-few seem to grasp the fact of the SPECIAL MESSAGE TO [WOMEN]441-women intended to be conveyed in the person of [the Virgin Mary]216-mary . [She]216-mary was actually [one of [the radiant Spirits of the Central Sphere]3111-the radiant spirits of the central sphere , imprisoned by [God]101-god 's will in [woman]3112-woman 's form]3110-one of the radiant spirits of the central sphere , imprisoned by god 's will in woman 's form . After the birth of [Christ]101-god , [she]216-mary was still kept on [earth]1946-earth , to follow [His]101-god career to the end . There was a secret understanding between [Himself]101-god and [her]216-mary . As for instance , when [she]216-mary found [Him]101-god among [the doctors of the law]3114-the doctors of the law , [she]216-mary for one moment suffered [her]216-mary humanity to get the better of [her]216-mary in anxious inquiries ; and [His]101-god reply , ' Why sought [ye]216-mary [Me]104-heliobas ? Wist [ye]216-mary not that [I]104-heliobas must be about [[My]104-heliobas Father]2013-my father 's business ? ' was a sort of reminder to [her]216-mary , which [she]216-mary at once accepted . Again , at the marriage feast in [Cana]67-cana of [Galilee]68-galilee , when [Christ]101-god turned the water into wine , [He]101-god said to [[His]101-god mother]3116-his mother , ' [WOMAN]3112-woman , what have [I]104-heliobas to do with [thee]3112-woman ? ' which meant simply : What have [I]104-heliobas to do with [thee]3112-woman as [WOMAN]3112-woman merely ? - which was another reminder to [her]216-mary of [her]216-mary spiritual origin , causing [her]216-mary at once to address [the servants who stood by]3119-the servants who stood by as follows : ' Whatsoever [He]101-god saith unto [you]216-mary , do it . ' And why , it may be asked , if [Mary]216-mary was really [an imprisoned immortal Spirit]3120-an imprisoned immortal spirit , sinless and joyous , should [she]216-mary be forced to suffer all the weaknesses , sorrows , and anxieties of [any ordinary woman]3121-any ordinary woman and [mother]3122-mother ? SIMPLY AS AN EXAMPLE TO [WOMEN who are [the mothers of the human race]3124-the mothers of the human race]3123-women who are the mothers of the human race ; and [who , being thus laid under a heavy responsibility]3125-who , being thus laid under a heavy responsibility , need sympathetic guidance . [Mary]216-mary 's life teaches [women]441-women that the virtues [they]441-women need are - obedience , purity , meekness , patience , long - suffering , modesty , self - denial , and endurance . [She]216-mary loved to hold a secondary position ; [she]216-mary placed [herself]216-mary in willing subjection to [Joseph]217-joseph - [a man of austere and simple life , advanced in years]3127-a man of austere and simple life , advanced in years , and weighted with the cares of [a family]3128-a family by a previous marriage - who wedded [her]216-mary by AN INFLUENCE WHICH COMPELLED [HIM]217-joseph to become [her]216-mary protector in the eyes of [the world]264-the world . Out of these facts , simple as they are , can be drawn the secret of happiness for [women]441-women - a secret and a lesson that , if learned by heart , would bring [them]441-women and those [they]441-women love out of storm and bewilderment into peace and safety .[104-heliobas]

" FOR THOSE WHO HAVE ONCE BECOME AWARE OF THE EXISTENCE OF [THE CENTRAL SPHERE AND OF THE ELECTRIC RING SURROUNDING [IT]69-the central sphere and of the electric ring surrounding it]69-the central sphere and of the electric ring surrounding it , AND WHO ARE ABLE TO REALISE TO [THE FULL THE GIGANTIC AS WELL AS MINUTE WORK PERFORMED BY THE ELECTRIC WAVES]70-the full the gigantic as well as minute work performed by the electric waves AROUND [US]3131-us AND WITHIN [US]3131-us , there can no longer be any doubt as to all the facts of Christianity , as none of [them]3132-them , VIEWED BY THE ELECTRIC THEORY , are otherwise than in accordance with [the Creator]2447-the creator 's love and sympathy with even the smallest portion of [His]2447-the creator creation .[104-heliobas]

" Why then , if Christianity be a Divine Truth , are not [all people Christians]3134-all people christians ? As well ask , if music and poetry are good things , why [all men]3135-all men are not [poets]2473-poets and [musicians]1072-musicians . Art seeks art ; in like manner [God]101-god seeks [God]101-god - that is , [He]101-god seeks portions of [His]101-god own essence among [[His]101-god creatures]2789-his creatures . [Christ]101-god [Himself]101-god said , ' Many are called , but few are chosen ; ' and it stands to reason that [very few souls]3139-very few souls will succeed in becoming pure enough to enter the Central Sphere without hindrance . [Many]3140-many , on leaving [Earth]1946-earth , will be detained in the Purgatory of Air , where thousands of spirits work for ages , watching over [others]324-others , helping and warning [others]324-others , and in this unselfish labour succeed in raising [themselves]3140-many , little by little , higher and ever higher , till [they]3140-many at last reach the longed - for goal . It must also be remembered that not only from [Earth]38-the earth , but from [ALL WORLDS]72-all worlds , [released souls]3144-released souls seek to attain final happiness in [the Central Sphere]55-the central sphere where [God]101-god is ; so that , however great the number of those that are permitted to proceed thither from [this little planet]3145-this little planet , [they]3139-very few souls can only form , as it were , one drop in [a mighty ocean]3146-a mighty ocean .[104-heliobas]

" It has been asked whether the Electric Theory of Christianity includes the doctrine of Hell , or a place of perpetual punishment . Eternal Punishment is merely a form of speech for what is really Eternal Retrogression . For as there is a Forward , so there must be a Backward . The electric germ of the Soul - delicate , fiery , and imperishable as it is - can be forced by its companion Will to take refuge in a lower form of material existence , dependent on the body [it]3147-it first inhabits . For instance , [a man who is obstinate in pursuing ACTIVE EVIL]3148-a man who is obstinate in pursuing active evil can so retrograde the progress of any spiritual life within [him]3148-a man who is obstinate in pursuing active evil , that [it]3148-a man who is obstinate in pursuing active evil shall lack the power to escape , as [it]3148-a man who is obstinate in pursuing active evil might do , from merely lymphatic and listless temperaments , to seek some other chance of development , but shall sink into the form of quadrupeds , birds , and [other creatures dominated by purely physical needs]3149-other creatures dominated by purely physical needs . But there is one thing it can never escape from - MEMORY . And in that faculty is constituted Hell . So that if [a man]278-a man , by choice , forces [his]278-a man soul DOWNWARD to inhabit hereafter the bodies of dogs , horses , and other like animals , [he]278-a man should know that [he]278-a man does so at the cost of everything except Remembrance . Eternal Retrogression means that the hopelessly tainted electric germ recoils further and further from the Pure Centre whence it sprang , ALWAYS BEARING WITHIN ITSELF the knowledge of WHAT IT WAS ONCE and WHAT IT MIGHT HAVE BEEN . There is a pathetic meaning in the eyes of a dog or a seal ; in the melancholy , patient gaze of the oxen toiling at the plough ; there is an unuttered warning in the silent faces of flowers ; there is more tenderness of regret in the voice of the nightingale than love ; and in the wild upward soaring of the lark , with its throat full of passionate , shouting prayer , there is shadowed forth the yearning hope that dies away in despair as the bird sinks to earth again , [his]278-a man instincts not half satisfied . There is no greater torture than to be compelled to remember , in suffering , joys and glorious opportunities gone for ever .[104-heliobas]

" Regarding the Electric Theory of Religion , it is curious to observe how the truth of it has again and again been dimly shadowed forth in the prophecies of Art , Science , and [Poesy]218-poesy . [The old painters who depicted a halo of light round the head of [[their]3151-the old painters who depicted a halo of light round the head of their virgins and saints Virgins]3152-their virgins and [Saints]219-saints]3151-the old painters who depicted a halo of light round the head of their virgins and saints did so out of a correct impulse which [they]3151-the old painters who depicted a halo of light round the head of their virgins and saints did not hesitate to obey . Footnote : An impulse which led [them]3151-the old painters who depicted a halo of light round the head of their virgins and saints vaguely to foresee , though , not to explain , the electric principle of spiritual life . [The astronomers who , after years of profound study , have been enabled to measure the flames of the burning sun , and to find out that these are from two to four thousand miles high]3153-the astronomers who , after years of profound study , have been enabled to measure the flames of the burning sun , and to find out that these are from two to four thousand miles high , are nearly arrived at the conclusion that it is [a world in a state of conflagration]3154-a world in a state of conflagration , in which [they]3153-the astronomers who , after years of profound study , have been enabled to measure the flames of the burning sun , and to find out that these are from two to four thousand miles high will be perfectly right . Those who hold that [this Earth of [ours]3156-we]3155-this earth of ours was once self - luminous are also right ; for it was indeed so when first projected from the Electric Ring . [The compilers or inventors of the ' Arabian Nights]3157-the compilers or inventors of the ' arabian nights ' also hit upon a truth when [they]3157-the compilers or inventors of the ' arabian nights described [human beings]2284-human beings as forced through evil influences to take the forms of lower animals - a truth just explained in the Law of Retrogression . All art , all prophecy , all poesy , should therefore be accepted eagerly and studied earnestly , for in [them]3157-the compilers or inventors of the ' arabian nights [we]3156-we find ELECTRIC INSPIRATION out of which [we]3156-we are able to draw lessons for [our]3156-we guidance hereafter . The great point that [scientists]3159-scientists and [artists]342-artists have hitherto failed to discover , is the existence of the Central Sphere and its Surrounding Electric Circle . Once realize these two great facts , and all the wonders and mysteries of [the Universe]1-the universe are perfectly easy of comprehension .[104-heliobas]

" In conclusion , [I]104-heliobas offer no opinion as to which is [Christ]101-god 's Church , or the Fountain - head of spirituality in [the world]264-the world . In [all Churches]3162-all churches errors have intruded through [unworthy and hypocritical members]3163-unworthy and hypocritical members . In [a crowded congregation of [worshippers]1842-worshippers]3164-a crowded congregation of worshippers there may perhaps be only [one or two who are free from self - interest and personal vanity]3166-one or two who are free from self - interest and personal vanity . In Sectarianism , for instance , there is no shred of Christianity . [Lovers of God]3167-lovers of god and [followers of Christ]3168-followers of christ must , in the first place , have perfect Unity ; and the bond uniting [them]3157-the compilers or inventors of the ' arabian nights must be an electric one of love and faith . [No true Christian]3169-no true christian should be able to hate , despise , or envy the other . Were [I]104-heliobas called upon to select among [the churches]3170-the churches , [I]104-heliobas should choose that which has most electricity working within it , and which is able to believe in a positive electrical communication between [Christ]101-god and [herself]101-god taking place daily on [her]3171-her altars - [a Church which holds , as it were , the other end of the telegraphic ray between [Earth]38-the earth and [the Central Sphere]3061-the central sphere]3172-a church which holds , as it were , the other end of the telegraphic ray between earth and the central sphere , and which is , therefore , able to exist among the storms of modern opinions , affording refuge and consolation to [the few determined travellers who are bound onward and upward]3174-the few determined travellers who are bound onward and upward . [I]104-heliobas shall not name [the Church]422-the church [I]104-heliobas mean , because it is the duty of [everyone]1821-everyone to examine and find it out for [himself]3177-himself or [herself]3178-herself . And even though [this Church]3179-this church instinctively works in the right direction , it is full of errors introduced by [ignorant and unworthy members]3180-ignorant and unworthy members - errors which must be carefully examined and cast aside by degrees . But , as [I]104-heliobas said before , it is [the only Church which has Principles of Electricity within [it]3179-this church]3181-the only church which has principles of electricity within it , and is therefore destined to live , because electricity is life .[104-heliobas]

" Now [I]104-heliobas beseech the reader of this manuscript to which [I]104-heliobas , [Heliobas]104-heliobas , append [my]104-heliobas hand and seal , to remember and realize earnestly the following invincible facts : first that [God]101-god and [[His]101-god Christ]3182-his christ EXIST ; secondly , that while the little paltry affairs of [our]3183-our temporal state are being built up as crazily as [a child]369-a child 's house of cards , the huge Central Sphere revolves , and the Electric Ring , strong and indestructible , is ever at its work of production and re - absorption ; thirdly , that every thought and word of EVERY HABITANT ON [EVERY PLANET]73-every planet is reflected in lightning language before [the Creator]215-the creator 's eyes as easily as [we]3183-our receive telegrams ; fourthly , that [this world]1957-this world is [THE ONLY SPOT IN [THE UNIVERSE]1-the universe where [His]101-god existence is actually questioned and doubted]3186-the only spot in the universe where his existence is actually questioned and doubted . And the general spread of modern positivism , materialism and atheism is one of the most terrific and meaning signs of the times . The work of separating the wheat from the chaff is beginning . [Those who love and believe in God and Spiritual Beauty]3187-those who love and believe in god and spiritual beauty are about to be placed on one side ; [the millions who worship Self]3188-the millions who worship self are drawing together in vast opposing ranks on the other ; and the moment approaches which is prophesied to be ' as the lightning that lighteneth out of the one part under heaven , and shineth even to the other part . ' In other words , the fiery whirlpool of [the Ring]50-the ring is nearly ready to absorb [[our]3183-our planet]3189-our planet in [its]3189-our planet vortex ; and out of all who dwell upon [its]3189-our planet surface , how many shall reach [the glorious Central World of [God]101-god]3190-the glorious central world of god ? Of [two men working in the same field]3191-two men working in the same field , shall it not be as [Christ]101-god foretold - ' the one shall be taken , and the other left ' ?[104-heliobas]

" [Friend]1845-friend , or [Pupil]220-pupil , [Reader]3193-reader ! Whoever [thou]3194-thou art , take heed and foster [thine]3194-thou own soul ! For know that nothing can hinder [the Immortal Germ within [us]3183-our]3195-the immortal germ within us from taking the form imposed upon it by [our]3183-our WILLS . Through Love and Faith , it can become [an Angel]284-an angel , and perform wonders even while in [its]3189-our planet [habitation of clay]3197-habitation of clay ; through indifference and apathy , it can desert [us]3183-our altogether and for ever ; through mockery and blasphemous disbelief , it can sink into even a lower form than that of snake or toad . In [our]3183-our own unfettered hand lies [our]3183-our eternal destiny . Wonderful and terrible responsibility ! Who shall dare to say [we]3183-our have no need of prayer ? "[104-heliobas]

This document was signed " Casimir Heliobas , "[104-heliobas] and bore a seal on which the impression seemed to consist of two Arabic or Sanskrit words , which [I]0-i could not understand . [I]0-i put it carefully away with its companion [MS]1225-ms . under lock and key , and while [I]0-i was yet pausing earnestly on its contents , [Zara]152-zara came into [[my]0-i room]546-my room . [She]152-zara had finished [her]152-zara task in [the studio]343-the studio , [she]152-zara said , and [she]152-zara now proposed a drive in [the Bois]1228-the bois as an agreeable way of passing the rest of the afternoon .

" [I]152-zara want to be as long as possible in [your]0-i company , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara added , with a caressing sweetness in [her]152-zara manner ; " for now [[your]0-i friends]2125-your friends have come to [Paris]5-paris , [I]152-zara expect [you]0-i will soon be leaving [us]3199-us , so [I]152-zara must have as much of [you]0-i as [I]152-zara can . "[152-zara]

[My]0-i heart sank at the thought of parting from [her]152-zara , and [I]0-i looked wistfully at [her]152-zara lovely face . [Leo]100-leo had followed [her]152-zara in from [the studio]343-the studio , and seemed still very melancholy .

" [We]1230-we shall always be [good friends]3200-good friends , [Zara]152-zara dearest , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , ' shall [we]1230-we not ? Close , [fond friends]1231-fond friends , like [sisters]1232-sisters ? "[0-i]

" [Sisters]1232-sisters are not always fond of [each other]2173-each other , "[152-zara] remarked [Zara]152-zara , half gaily . " And [you]0-i know ' there is [a friend that sticketh closer than a brother]3203-a friend that sticketh closer than a brother ' ! "[152-zara]

" And what [friend]1845-friend is that in [YOUR]152-zara case ? "[0-i] [I]0-i asked , half jestingly , half curiously .

" [Death]187-death ! "[152-zara] [she]152-zara replied with a strange smile , in which there was both pathos and triumph .

[I]0-i started at [her]152-zara unexpected reply , and a kind of foreboding chilled [my]0-i blood . [I]0-i endeavoured , however , to speak cheerfully as [I]0-i said :

" Why , of course , death sticks more closely to [us]1230-we than [any friend]3205-any friend or [relative]3206-relative . But [you]0-i look fitter to receive the embraces of life than of death , [Zara]152-zara . "[0-i]

" [They]3207-they are both one and the same thing , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara answered ; " or rather , the one leads to the other . But do not let [us]1233-us begin to philosophize . Put on [your]0-i things and come . [The carriage]2340-the carriage is waiting . "[152-zara]

[I]0-i readily obeyed [her]152-zara , and [we]1233-us enjoyed an exhilarating drive together . The rest of the day passed with [us]1233-us all very pleasantly and [our]1233-us conversation had principally to do with the progress of art and literature in [many lands]1234-many lands , and maintained itself equably on the level of mundane affairs . Among other things , [we]1233-us spoke of [the Spanish violinist Sarasate]143-sarasate , and [I]0-i amused [Heliobas]104-heliobas by quoting to [him]104-heliobas some of the criticisms of the [London]2-london daily papers on [this great artist]1235-this great artist , such as , " [He]1235-this great artist plays pieces which , though adapted to show [his]1235-this great artist wonderful skill , are the veriest clap - trap ; "[104-heliobas] " [He]1235-this great artist lacks breadth and colour ; "[104-heliobas] " A true type of [the artist virtuoso , "[104-heliobas] etc .]3209-the artist virtuoso , " etc . , etc .

" [Half these people]3210-half these people do not know in the least what [they]3210-half these people mean by ' breadth and colour ' or ' virtuosity , ' "[104-heliobas] said [Heliobas]104-heliobas , with a smile . " [They]3210-half these people think emotion , passion , all true sentiment combined with extraordinary TECHNIQUE , must be ' clap - trap . ' Now [the Continent of [Europe]26-europe]3211-the continent of europe acknowledges [Pablo de Sarasate]143-sarasate as [the first violinist living]3212-the first violinist living , and [London]2-london would not be [London]2-london unless it could thrust an obtuse opposing opinion in the face of [the Continent]3213-the continent . [England]10-england is [the last country in [the world]264-the world to accept anything new]3214-the last country in the world to accept anything new . [[Its]10-england people]3216-its people are tired and blase ; like highly trained circus - horses , [they]3216-its people want to trot or gallop always in the old grooves . It will always be so . [Sarasate]143-sarasate is like a brilliant meteor streaming across [their]3216-its people narrow bit of the heaven of music ; [they]3216-its people stare , gape , and think it is an unnatural phenomenon - a ' virtuosity ' in the way of meteors , which [they]3216-its people are afraid to accept lest it set [them]3216-its people on fire . What would [you]3217-you ? The meteor shines and burns ; it is always a meteor ! "[104-heliobas]

So , talking lightly , and gliding from subject to subject , the hours wore away , and [we]1236-us at last separated for the night .

[I]0-i shall always be glad to remember how tenderly [Zara]152-zara kissed [me]0-i and wished [me]0-i good repose ; and [I]0-i recall now , with mingled pain , wonder , and gratitude , how perfectly calm and contented [I]0-i felt as , after [my]0-i prayers , [I]0-i sank to sleep , unwarned , and therefore happily unconscious , of what awaited [me]0-i on the morrow .

CHAPTER XV .

DEATH BY LIGHTNING .

The morning of the next day dawned rather gloomily . A yellowish fog obscured the air , and there was a closeness and sultriness in the atmosphere that was strange for that wintry season . [I]0-i had slept well , and rose with the general sense of ease and refreshment that [I]0-i always experienced since [I]0-i had been under the treatment of [Heliobas]104-heliobas . Those whose unhappy physical condition causes [them]1237-them to awake from uneasy slumber feeling almost more fatigued than when [they]1237-them retired to rest , can scarcely have any idea of the happiness it engenders to open untired , glad eyes with the morning light ; to feel the very air a nourishment ; to stand with lithe , rested limbs in the bath of cool , pure water , finding that limpid element obediently adding its quota to the vigour of perfect health ; to tingle from head to foot with the warm current of life running briskly through the veins , making the heart merry , the brain clear , and all the powers of body and mind in active working condition . This is indeed most absolute enjoyment . Add to it the knowledge of the existence of one 's own inner Immortal Spirit - the beautiful germ of Light in the fostering of which no labour is ever taken in vain - the living , wondrous thing that is destined to watch an eternity of worlds bloom and fade to bloom again , like flowers , while itself , superior to [them]1238-them all , shall become ever more strong and radiant - with these surroundings and prospects , who shall say life is not worth living ?

Dear Life ! sweet Moment ! gracious Opportunity ! brief Journey so well worth the taking ! gentle Exile so well worth enduring ! - [thy]1239-thy bitterest sorrows are but blessings in disguise ; [thy]1239-thy sharpest pains are brought upon [us]1236-us by [ourselves]1236-us , and even then are turned to warnings for [our]1236-us guidance ; while above [us]1236-us , through [us]1236-us , and around [us]1236-us radiates the Supreme Love , unalterably tender !

These thoughts , and others like them , all more or less conducive to cheerfulness , occupied [me]0-i till [I]0-i had finished dressing . Melancholy was now no part of [my]0-i nature , otherwise [I]0-i might have been depressed by the appearance of the weather and the murkiness of the air . But since [I]0-i learned the simple secrets of physical electricity , atmospheric influences have had no effect upon the equable poise of [my]0-i temperament - a fact for which [I]0-i can not be too grateful , seeing how many of [my]0-i fellow - creatures permit [themselves]1237-them to be affected by changes in the wind , intense heat , intense cold , or other things of the like character .

[I]0-i went down to breakfast , singing softly on [my]0-i way , and [I]0-i found [Zara]152-zara already seated at the head of [her]152-zara table , while [Heliobas]104-heliobas was occupied in reading and sorting a pile of letters that lay beside [his]104-heliobas plate . [Both]1240-both greeted [me]0-i with [their]1240-both usual warmth and heartiness .

During the repast , however , [the brother]1241-the brother and [sister]1242-sister were strangely silent , and once or twice [I]0-i fancied that [Zara]152-zara 's eyes filled with tears , though [she]152-zara smiled again so quickly and radiantly that [I]0-i felt [I]0-i was mistaken .

A piece of behaviour on the part of [Leo]100-leo , too , filled [me]0-i with dismay . [He]100-leo had been lying quietly at [[his]100-leo master]1772-his master 's feet for some time , when [he]100-leo suddenly arose , sat upright , and lifting [his]100-leo nose in air , uttered a most prolonged and desolate howl . Anything more thoroughly heartbroken and despairing than that cry [I]0-i have never heard . After [he]100-leo had concluded it , the poor animal seemed ashamed of what [he]100-leo had done , and creeping meekly along , with drooping head and tail , [he]100-leo kissed [[his]100-leo master]1772-his master 's hand , then [mine]0-i , and lastly [Zara]152-zara 's . Finally , [he]100-leo went into a distant corner and lay down again , as if [his]100-leo feelings were altogether too much for [him]100-leo .

" Is [he]100-leo ill ? "[0-i] [I]0-i asked pityingly .

" [I]104-heliobas think not , "[104-heliobas] replied [Heliobas]104-heliobas . " The weather is peculiar to - day - close , and almost thunderous ; dogs are very susceptible to such changes . "[104-heliobas]

At that moment the page entered bearing a silver salver , on which lay a letter , which [he]100-leo handed to [[his]100-leo master]1772-his master and immediately retired .

[Heliobas]104-heliobas opened and read it .

" [Ivan]153-prince ivan regrets [he]153-prince ivan can not dine with [us]1247-we to - day , "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas said , glancing at [[his]104-heliobas sister]2320-his sister ; " [he]153-prince ivan is otherwise engaged . [He]153-prince ivan says , however , that [he]153-prince ivan hopes to have the pleasure of looking in during the latter part of the evening . "[104-heliobas]

[Zara]152-zara inclined [her]152-zara head gently , and made no other reply .

A few seconds afterwards [we]1247-we rose from table , and [Zara]152-zara , linking [her]152-zara arm through [mine]1248-mine , said :

" [I]152-zara want to have a talk with [you]1248-mine while [we]1247-we can be alone . Come to [[my]152-zara room]546-my room . "[152-zara]

[We]1247-we went [upstairs]639-upstairs together , followed by [the wise yet doleful [Leo]100-leo , who seemed determined not to let [[his]100-leo mistress]1251-his mistress out of [his]100-leo sight]1250-the wise yet doleful leo , who seemed determined not to let his mistress out of his sight . When [we]1247-we arrived at [our]1247-we destination , [Zara]152-zara pushed [me]0-i gently into an easy - chair , and seated [herself]152-zara in another one opposite .

" [I]152-zara am going to ask a favour of [you]0-i , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara began ; " because [I]152-zara know [you]0-i will do anything to please [me]152-zara or [Casimir]152-zara . Is it not so ? "[152-zara]

[I]0-i assured [her]152-zara [she]152-zara might rely upon [my]0-i observing ; with the truest fidelity any request of [hers]152-zara , small or great .

[She]152-zara thanked [me]0-i and resumed :

" [You]0-i know [I]152-zara have been working secretly in [[my]152-zara studio]2223-my studio for some time past . [I]152-zara have been occupied in the execution of two designs - one is finished , and is intended as a gift to [Casimir]152-zara . The other "[152-zara] - [she]152-zara hesitated - " is incomplete . [I]152-zara made an attempt beyond [my]152-zara powers - in short , [I]152-zara can not carry out the idea to [my]152-zara satisfaction . [I]152-zara have reason to believe that [I]152-zara shall be compelled to take a sudden journey - promise [me]152-zara that when [I]152-zara am gone [you]0-i will see that unfinished statue completely destroyed - utterly demolished . "[152-zara]

[I]0-i could not answer [her]152-zara for a minute or two , [I]0-i was so surprised by [her]152-zara words .

" Going on a journey , [Zara]152-zara ? "[0-i] [I]0-i said . " Well , if [you]152-zara are , [I]0-i suppose [you]152-zara will soon return [home]1856-home again ; and why should [your]152-zara statue be destroyed in the meantime ? [You]152-zara may yet be able to bring it to final perfection . "[0-i]

[Zara]152-zara shook [her]152-zara head and smiled half sadly .

" [I]152-zara told [you]0-i it was a favour [I]152-zara had to ask of [you]0-i , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara said ; " and now [you]0-i are unwilling to grant it . "[152-zara]

" [I]0-i am not unwilling - believe [me]0-i , dearest , [I]0-i would do anything to please [you]152-zara , "[0-i] [I]0-i assured [her]152-zara ; " but it seems so strange to [me]0-i that [you]152-zara should wish the result of [your]152-zara labour destroyed , simply because [you]152-zara are going on a journey . "[0-i]

" Strange as it seems , [I]152-zara desire it most earnestly , "[152-zara] said [Zara]152-zara ; " otherwise - but if [you]0-i will not see it done for [me]152-zara , [I]152-zara must preside at the work of demolition [myself]152-zara , though [I]152-zara frankly confess it would be most painful to [me]152-zara . "[152-zara]

[I]0-i interrupted [her]152-zara .

" Say no more , [Zara]152-zara ! "[0-i] [I]0-i exclaimed ; " [I]0-i will do as [you]152-zara wish . When [you]152-zara are gone , [you]152-zara say - "[0-i]

" When [I]152-zara am gone , "[152-zara] repeated [Zara]152-zara firmly , " and before [you]0-i [yourself]0-i leave [this house]2603-this house , [you]0-i will see that particular statue destroyed . [You]0-i will thus do [me]152-zara a very great service . "[152-zara]

" [I]152-zara hope so - [I]152-zara think so , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara replied evasively ; " at any rate , [we]3223-we shall meet again soon . "[152-zara]

" Where are [you]152-zara going ? "[0-i] [I]0-i asked .

[She]152-zara smiled . Such a lovely , glad , and triumphant smile !

" [You]0-i will know [my]152-zara destination before to - night has passed away , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara answered . " In the meanwhile [I]152-zara have [your]0-i promise ? "[152-zara]

" Most certainly . "[152-zara]

[She]152-zara kissed [me]0-i , and as [she]152-zara did so , a lurid flash caught [my]0-i eyes and almost dazzled them . It was a gleam of fiery lustre from the electric jewel [she]152-zara wore .

The day went on its usual course , and the weather seemed to grow murkier every hour . The air was almost sultry , and when during the afternoon [I]0-i went into [the conservatory]383-the conservatory to gather some of the glorious Marechal Niel roses that grew there in such perfection , the intense heat of [the place]2197-the place was nearly insupportable . [I]0-i saw nothing of [Heliobas]104-heliobas all day , and , after the morning , very little of [Zara]152-zara . [She]152-zara disappeared soon after luncheon , and [I]0-i could not find [her]152-zara in [[her]152-zara rooms]1254-her rooms nor in [[her]152-zara studio]690-her studio , though [I]0-i knocked at the door several times . [Leo]100-leo , too , was missing . After being alone for an hour or more , [I]0-i thought [I]0-i would pay a visit to [the chapel]2310-the chapel . But on attempting to carry out this intention [I]0-i found [its]2310-the chapel doors locked - an unusual circumstance which rather surprised [me]0-i . Fancying that [I]0-i heard the sound of voices within , [I]0-i paused to listen . But all was profoundly silent . Strolling into [the hall]572-the hall , [I]0-i took up at random from a side - table a little volume of poems , unknown to [me]0-i , called " Pygmalion in [Cyprus]74-cyprus ; "[0-i] and seating [myself]0-i in one of the luxurious Oriental easy - chairs near the silvery sparkling fountain , [I]0-i began to read . [I]0-i opened the book [I]0-i held at " A Ballad of Kisses , "[0-i] which ran as follows :

" There are three kisses that [I]0-i call to mind , And [I]0-i will sing [their]3224-their secrets as [I]0-i go , - The first , a kiss too courteous to be kind , Was such a kiss as [monks]3225-monks and [maidens]3226-maidens know , As sharp as frost , as blameless as the snow .[0-i]

" The second kiss , ah [God]101-god ! [I]0-i feel it yet , - And evermore [my]0-i soul will loathe the same , - The toys and joys of fate [I]0-i may forget , But not the touch of that divided shame ; It clove [my]0-i lips - it burnt [me]0-i like a flame .[0-i]

" The third , the final kiss , is one [I]0-i use Morning and noon and night , and not amiss . [Sorrow]221-sorrow be [mine]0-i if such [I]0-i do refuse ! And when [I]0-i die , be Love enrapt in bliss Re - sanctified in heaven by such a kiss ! "[0-i]

This little gem , which [I]0-i read and re - read with pleasure , was only one of many in the same collection , [The author]1891-the author was assuredly [a man of genius]1259-a man of genius . [I]0-i studied [his]1891-the author word - melodies with intense interest , and noted with some surprise how original and beautiful were many of [his]1891-the author fancies and similes . [I]0-i say [I]0-i noted them with surprise , because [he]1891-the author was evidently [a modern Englishman]1260-a modern englishman , and yet unlike any other of [his]1891-the author writing species . [His]1891-the author name was not [Alfred Tennyson]141-tennyson , nor [Edwin Arnold]222-edwin arnold , nor [Matthew Arnold]223-matthew arnold , nor [Austin Dobson]150-austin dobson , nor [Martin Tupper]224-martin tupper . [He]1891-the author was neither plagiarist nor [translator]1261-translator - [he]1891-the author was actually [an original man]1262-an original man . [I]0-i do not give [his]1891-the author name here , as [I]0-i consider it the duty of [[his]1891-the author own country]1263-his own country to find [him]1891-the author out and acknowledge [him]1891-the author , which , as it is so proud of [its]1263-his own country literary standing , of course it will do in due season . On this , [my]0-i first introduction to [his]1891-the author poems , [I]0-i became speedily absorbed in them , and was repeating to [myself]0-i softly a verse which [I]0-i remember now :

" [Hers]3227-hers was sweetest of sweet faces , [Hers]3227-hers the tenderest eyes of all ; In [her]3227-hers hair [she]3227-hers had the traces Of a heavenly coronal , Bringing sunshine to sad places Where the sunlight could not fall . "[0-i]

Then [I]0-i was startled by the sound of a clock striking six . [I]0-i bethought [myself]0-i of [the people who were coming to dinner]1264-the people who were coming to dinner , and decided to go to [[my]0-i room]546-my room and dress . Replacing the " Pygmalion "[152-zara] book on the table whence [I]0-i had taken it , [I]0-i made [my]0-i way [upstairs]639-upstairs , thinking as [I]0-i went of [Zara]152-zara and [her]152-zara strange request , and wondering what journey [she]152-zara was going upon .

[I]0-i could not come to any satisfactory conclusion on this point , besides , [I]0-i had a curious disinclination to think about it very earnestly , though the subject kept recurring to [my]0-i mind . Yet always some inward monitor seemed to assure [me]0-i , as plainly as though the words were spoken in [my]0-i ear :

" It is useless for [you]3228-you to consider the reason of this , or the meaning of that . Take things as they come in due order : one circumstance explains the other , and everything is always for the best . "[0-i]

[I]0-i prepared [my]0-i Indian crepe dress for the evening , the same [I]0-i had worn for [Madame Didier]107-madame didier 's party at [Cannes]4-cannes ; only , instead of having lilies of [the valley]477-the valley to ornament it with , [I]0-i arranged some clusters of the Marechal Niel roses [I]0-i had gathered from [the conservatory]383-the conservatory - lovely blossoms , with their dewy pale - gold centres forming perfect cups of delicious fragrance . These , relieved by a few delicate sprays of [the maiden - hair fern]1269-the maiden - hair fern , formed a becoming finish to [my]0-i simple costume . As [I]0-i arrayed [myself]0-i , and looked at [my]0-i own reflection in the long mirror , [I]0-i smiled out of sheer gratitude . For health , joyous and vigorous , sparkled in [my]0-i eyes , glowed on [my]0-i cheeks , tinted [my]0-i lips , and rounded [my]0-i figure . The face that looked back at [me]0-i from the glass was [a perfectly happy one , ready to dimple into glad mirth or bright laughter]1270-a perfectly happy one , ready to dimple into glad mirth or bright laughter . No shadow of pain or care remained upon it to remind [me]0-i of past suffering , and [I]0-i murmured half aloud : " Thank [God]101-god ! "[0-i]

" Amen ! "[0-i] said a soft voice , and , turning round , [I]0-i saw [Zara]152-zara .

But how shall [I]0-i describe [her]152-zara ? No words can adequately paint the glorious beauty in which , that night , [she]152-zara seemed to move as in an atmosphere of [her]152-zara own creating . [She]152-zara wore a clinging robe of the richest , softest white satin , caught in at the waist by a zone of pearls - pearls which , from their size and purity , must have been priceless . [Her]152-zara beautiful neck and arms were bare , and twelve rows of pearls were clasped round [her]152-zara slender throat , supporting in their centre the electric stone , which shone with a soft , subdued radiance , like the light of the young moon . [Her]152-zara rich , dark hair was arranged in its usual fashion - that is , hanging down in one thick plait , which on this occasion was braided in and out with small pearls . On [her]152-zara bosom [she]152-zara wore a magnificent cluster of natural orange - blossoms ; and of these , while [I]0-i gazed admiringly at [her]152-zara , [I]0-i first spoke :

" [You]152-zara look like [a bride]3229-a bride , [Zara]152-zara ! [You]152-zara have all the outward signs of one - white satin , pearls , and orange - blossoms ! "[0-i]

[She]152-zara smiled .

" They are the first cluster that has come out in [[our]3230-our conservatory]3231-our conservatory , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara said ; " and [I]152-zara could not resist them . " Quite , "[0-i] [I]0-i answered .

[She]152-zara hesitated and sighed . Then [she]152-zara raised [her]152-zara lovely eyes with a sort of wistful tenderness .

" [You]0-i will never forget [me]152-zara , will [you]0-i ? "[152-zara] [she]152-zara asked almost anxiously ; " never cease to think of [me]152-zara kindly ? "[152-zara]
