[I]0-i felt bewildered , but [she]152-zara would not give [me]0-i time to utter another syllable . [She]152-zara took [my]0-i hand and hurried [me]0-i with [her]152-zara [downstairs]3240-downstairs , and in another moment [we]1273-we were both in [the drawing - room]2283-the drawing - room , receiving and saying polite nothings to [the Everards]225-the everards and Challoners , who had all arrived together , resplendent in evening costume . [Amy Everard]93-amy , [I]0-i thought , looked a little tired and fagged , though [she]93-amy rejoiced in a superb " arrangement "[93-amy] by Worth of ruby velvet and salmon - pink . But , though a perfect dress is consoling to [most women]2582-most women , there are times when even that fails of its effect ; and then Worth ceases to loom before the feminine eye as a sort of [demi - god]1276-demi - god , but dwindles insignificantly to the level of [a mere tailor]1277-a mere tailor , whose prices are ruinous . And this , [I]0-i think , was the state of mind in which [Mrs. Everard]93-amy found [herself]152-zara that evening ; or else [she]152-zara was a trifle jealous of [Zara]152-zara 's harmonious grace and loveliness . Be this as it may , [she]152-zara was irritable , and whisperingly found fault with , [me]0-i for being in such good health .

" [You]0-i will have too much colour if [you]0-i do n't take care , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara said almost pettishly , " and nothing is so unfashionable . "[152-zara]

" [I]0-i know ! "[0-i] [I]0-i replied with due meekness . " It is very bad style to be quite well - it is almost improper . "[0-i]

[She]152-zara looked at [me]0-i , and a glimmering smile lighted [her]152-zara features . But [she]152-zara would not permit [herself]152-zara to become good - humoured , and [she]152-zara furled and unfurled [her]152-zara fan of pink ostrich feathers with some impatience .

" Where did [that child]3245-that child get all those pearls from ? "[152-zara] [she]152-zara next inquired , with a gesture of [her]152-zara head towards [Zara]152-zara .

" They belonged to [[her]3245-that child mother]2043-her mother , "[0-i] [I]0-i answered , smiling as [I]0-i heard [Zara]152-zara called [a CHILD]369-a child , knowing , as [I]0-i did , [her]152-zara real age .

" [She]3245-that child is actually wearing a small fortune on [her]3245-that child person , "[93-amy] went on [Amy]93-amy ; " [I]93-amy wonder [[her]3245-that child brother]703-her brother allows [her]3245-that child . [Girls]3248-girls never understand the value of things of that sort . [They]3248-girls should be kept for [her]3245-that child till [she]3245-that child is old enough to appreciate [them]3248-girls . "[93-amy]

[I]0-i made no reply ; [I]0-i was absorbed in watching [Heliobas]104-heliobas , who at that moment entered [the room]385-the room accompanied by [Father Paul]204-father paul . [He]104-heliobas greeted [[his]104-heliobas guests]1280-his guests with warmth and unaffected heartiness , and all present were , [I]0-i could see , at once fascinated by the dignity of [his]104-heliobas presence and the charm of [his]104-heliobas manner . To an uninstructed eye there was nothing unusual about [him]104-heliobas ; but to [me]0-i there was a change in [his]104-heliobas expression which , as it were , warned and startled [me]0-i . A deep shadow of anxiety in [his]104-heliobas eyes made them look more sombre and less keen ; [his]104-heliobas smile was not so sweet as it was stern , and there was an undefinable SOMETHING in [his]104-heliobas very bearing that suggested - what ? Defiance ? Yes , defiance ; and it was this which , when [I]0-i had realized it , curiously alarmed [me]0-i . For what had [he]104-heliobas , [Heliobas]104-heliobas , to do with even the thought of defiance ? Did not all [his]104-heliobas power come from the knowledge of the necessity of obedience to the spiritual powers within and without ? Quick as light the words spoken to [me]0-i by [Aztul]226-aztul regarding [him]104-heliobas came back to [my]0-i remembrance : " Even as [he]104-heliobas is [[my]226-aztul Beloved]2815-my beloved , so let [him]104-heliobas not fail to hear [my]226-aztul voice . "[226-aztul] What if [he]104-heliobas SHOULD fail ? A kind of instinct came upon [me]0-i that some immediate danger of this threatened [him]104-heliobas , and [I]0-i braced [myself]0-i up to a firm determination , that , if this was so , [I]0-i , out of [my]0-i deep gratitude to [him]104-heliobas , would do [my]0-i utmost best to warn [him]104-heliobas in time . While these thoughts possessed [me]0-i , the hum of gay conversation went on , and [Zara]152-zara 's bright laughter ever and again broke like music on the air . [Father Paul]204-father paul , too , proved [himself]204-father paul to be of quite a festive and jovial disposition , for [he]204-father paul made [himself]204-father paul agreeable to [Mrs. Challoner]156-mrs. challoner and [[her]156-mrs. challoner daughters]1281-her daughters , and entertained [them]1282-them with the ease and bonhomie of [an accomplished courtier]1283-an accomplished courtier and [man of [the world]264-the world]1284-man of the world .

Dinner was announced in the usual way - that is , with the sound of music played by the electric instrument devoted to that purpose , a performance which elicited much admiration from [all the guests]1286-all the guests . [Heliobas]104-heliobas led the way into [the dining - room]1287-the dining - room with [Mrs. Everard]152-zara ; [Colonel Everard]92-colonel everard followed , with [Zara]152-zara on one arm and [the eldest Miss Challoner]1288-the eldest miss challoner on the other ; [Mr. Challoner]199-mr. challoner and [myself]0-i came next ; and [Father Paul]204-father paul , with [Mrs. Challoner]156-mrs. challoner and [[her]156-mrs. challoner other daughter]1289-her other daughter [Effie]159-effie , brought up the rear . There was a universal murmur of surprise and delight as the dinner - table came in view ; and its arrangement was indeed a triumph of art . In the centre was placed a large round of crystal in imitation of [a lake]1290-a lake , and on this apparently floated a beautiful gondola steered by the figure of a gondolier , both exquisitely wrought in fine Venetian glass . [The gondolier]1291-the gondolier was piled high with a cargo of roses ; but the wonder of it all was , that the whole design was lit up by electricity . Electric sparkles , like drops of dew , shone on the leaves of the flowers ; [the gondola]1292-the gondola was lit from end to end with electric stars , which were reflected with prismatic brilliancy in the crystal below ; [the gondolier]1291-the gondolier 's long pole glittered with what appeared to be drops of water tinged by the moonlight , but which was really an electric wire , and in [his]1291-the gondolier cap flashed an electric diamond . The whole ornament scintillated and glowed like a marvellous piece of curiously contrived jewel - work . And this was not all . Beside [every guest at table]1294-every guest at table a slender vase , shaped like a long - stemmed Nile lily , held roses and ferns , in which were hidden tiny electric stars , causing the blossoms to shine with a transparent and almost fairy - like lustre .

[Four graceful youths , clad in the Armenian costume]1295-four graceful youths , clad in the armenian costume , stood waiting silently round the table till [all present]1161-all present were seated , and then [they]1295-four graceful youths , clad in the armenian costume commenced the business of serving the viands , with swift and noiseless dexterity . As soon as the soup was handed round , tongues were loosened , and [the Challoners]177-the challoners , who had been gazing at everything in almost open - mouthed astonishment , began to relieve [their]1295-four graceful youths , clad in the armenian costume feelings by warm expressions of unqualified admiration , in which [Colonel]92-colonel everard and [Mrs. Everard]152-zara were not slow to join .

" [I]156-mrs. challoner do say , and [I]156-mrs. challoner will say , this beats all [I]156-mrs. challoner 've ever seen , "[156-mrs. challoner] said [good Mrs. Challoner]156-mrs. challoner , as [she]156-mrs. challoner bent to examine the glittering vase of flowers near [her]156-mrs. challoner plate .

" And this is real electric light ? And is it perfectly harmless ? "[156-mrs. challoner]

[Heliobas]104-heliobas smilingly assured [her]156-mrs. challoner of the safety of [his]104-heliobas table decorations . " Electricity , "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas said , " though the most powerful of [masters]3250-masters , is [the most docile of slaves]3251-the most docile of slaves . It is capable of the smallest as well as of the greatest uses . It can give with equal certainty life or death ; in fact , it is the key - note of creation . "[104-heliobas]

" Is that [your]92-colonel everard theory , [sir]3252-sir ? "[92-colonel everard] asked [Colonel Everard]92-colonel everard .

" It is not only [my]104-heliobas theory , "[104-heliobas] answered [Heliobas]104-heliobas , " it is a truth , indisputable and unalterable , to [those who have studied the mysteries of electric science]3253-those who have studied the mysteries of electric science . "[104-heliobas]

" And do [you]92-colonel everard base all [your]92-colonel everard medical treatment on this principle ? "[1857-the colonel] pursued [the Colonel]1857-the colonel .

" Certainly . [[Your]92-colonel everard young friend here , who came to [me]104-heliobas from [Cannes]4-cannes , looking as if [she]3254-your young friend here , who came to me from cannes , looking as if she had but a few months to live had but a few months to live]3254-your young friend here , who came to me from cannes , looking as if she had but a few months to live , can bear witness to the efficacy of [my]104-heliobas method . "[104-heliobas]

Every eye was now turned upon [me]0-i , and [I]0-i looked up and laughed .

" Do [you]93-amy remember , [Amy]93-amy , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , addressing [Mrs. Everard]93-amy , " how [you]93-amy told [me]93-amy [I]93-amy looked like [a sick nun]1885-a sick nun at [Cannes]4-cannes ? What do [I]93-amy look like now ? "[93-amy]

The conversation now became general , and turned , among other subjects , upon the growing reputation of [Raffaello Cellini]97-cellini .

" What surprises [me]92-colonel everard in [that young man]1753-that young man , "[92-colonel everard] said [Colonel Everard]92-colonel everard , " is [his]1753-that young man colouring . "[92-colonel everard]

The fine sensitive mouth of [Heliobas]104-heliobas curved in a somewhat sarcastic smile .

" Mere trickery , [[my]104-heliobas dear sir]2072-my dear sir - a piece of clap - trap , "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas said lightly . " That is what would be said of such pictures - in [England]10-england at least . And it WILL be said by many oracular , long - established newspapers , while [Cellini]97-cellini lives . As soon as [he]97-cellini is dead - ah ! c'est autre chose ! - [he]97-cellini will then most probably be acknowledged [the greatest master of the age]3259-the greatest master of the age . [I]199-mr. challoner calculate there 's a good many worlds flying round in space , but a more ridiculous , feeble - minded , contrary sort of world than this one , [I]199-mr. challoner defy any archangel to find ! "[199-mr. challoner]

[Heliobas]104-heliobas laughed , nodded , and after a slight pause resumed :

" It is astonishing to [me]104-heliobas that [people]1754-people do not see to what an infinite number of uses [they]1754-people could put the little re - discovery [they]1754-people have made of LUMINOUS PAINT . In that simple thing there is a secret , which as yet [they]1754-people do not guess - a wonderful , beautiful , scientific secret , which may perhaps take [them]1754-people a few hundred years to find out . In the meantime [they]1754-people have got hold of one end of the thread ; [they]1754-people can make luminous paint , and with it [they]1754-people can paint [light - houses]3265-light - houses , and , what is far more important - [ships]1013-ships . Vessels in [mid - ocean]3267-mid - ocean will have no more need of fog - signals and different - coloured lamps ; [their]1754-people own coat of paint will be sufficient to light [them]1754-people safely on [their]1754-people way . [Even rooms]3268-even rooms can be so painted as to be perfectly luminous at night . [A friend of mine]3269-a friend of mine , residing in [Italy]27-italy , has [a luminous ballroom]3270-a luminous ballroom , where the ceiling is decorated with a moon and stars in electric light . The effect is exceedingly lovely ; and though [people]1754-people think a great deal of money must have been laid out upon it , it is perhaps [the only great ballroom in [Italy]27-italy]3272-the only great ballroom in italy that has been really cheaply fitted up . But , as [I]104-heliobas said before , there is another secret behind the invention or discovery of luminous paint - a secret which , when once unveiled , will revolutionize all the schools of art in [the world]264-the world . "[104-heliobas]

" Do [you]156-mrs. challoner know this secret ? "[156-mrs. challoner] asked [Mrs. Challoner]156-mrs. challoner .

" Yes , [madame]1750-madame - perfectly . "[104-heliobas]

" Then why do n't [you]156-mrs. challoner disclose it for the benefit of [everybody]1916-everybody ? "[228-erne challoner] demanded [Erne Challoner]228-erne challoner .

" Because , [[my]104-heliobas dear young lady]3276-my dear young lady , [no one]1820-no one would believe [me]104-heliobas if [I]104-heliobas did . The time is not yet ripe for it . [The world]264-the world must wait till [[its]264-the world people]3216-its people are better educated . "[104-heliobas]

" Better educated ! "[93-amy] exclaimed [Mrs. Everard]93-amy . " Why , there is nothing talked of nowadays but education and progress ! [The very children]2235-the very children are wiser than [[their]2235-the very children parents]3281-their parents ! "[93-amy]

" [The children]3282-the children ! "[104-heliobas] returned [Heliobas]104-heliobas , half inquiringly , half indignantly . " At the rate things are going , there will soon be [no children]3283-no children left ; [they]3282-the children will all be [tired [little old men]3285-little old men and [women]441-women before [they]3282-the children are in [their]3282-the children teens]3284-tired little old men and women before they are in their teens . [The very babes]3287-the very babes will be born old . [Many of [them]3287-the very babes]1038-many of them are being brought up without any faith in God or religion ; the result will be an increase of vice and crime . [The purblind philosophers]3289-the purblind philosophers , [miscalled wise men]3290-miscalled wise men , who teach [the children]3282-the children by the light of poor human reason only , and do away with faith in spiritual things , are bringing down upon the generations to come an unlooked - for and most terrific curse . Childhood , the happy , innocent , sweet , unthinking , almost angelic age , at which Nature would have [us]3292-us believe in fairies and all the delicate aerial fancies of [poets]2473-poets , who are , after all , [the only true sages]3294-the only true sages - childhood , [I]104-heliobas say , is being gradually stamped out under the cruel iron heel of the Period - a period not of wisdom , health , or beauty , but one of drunken delirium , in which [the world]264-the world rushes feverishly along , its eyes fixed on [one hard , glittering , stony - featured idol - Gold]3296-one hard , glittering , stony - featured idol - gold . Education ! Is it education to teach [the young]3297-the young that [their]3297-the young chances of happiness depend on being richer than [[their]3297-the young neighbours]601-their neighbours ? Yet that is what it all tends to . Get on ! - be successful ! Trample on [others]324-others , but push forward [yourself]3300-yourself ! Money , money ! - let its chink be [your]3300-yourself music ; let its yellow shine be fairer than the eyes of love or friendship ! Let its piles accumulate and ever accumulate ! There are [beggars]3301-beggars in [the streets]1205-the streets , but [they]3301-beggars are [impostors]3303-impostors ! There is poverty in many places , but why seek to relieve it ? Why lessen the sparkling heaps of gold by so much as a coin ? Accumulate and ever accumulate ! Live so , and then - die ! And then - who knows what then ? "[104-heliobas]

[His]1298-his voice had been full of ringing eloquence as [he]1298-his spoke , but at these last words it sank into a low , thrilling tone of solemnity and earnestness . [We]1299-we all looked at [him]1298-his , fascinated by [his]1298-his manner , and were silent .

[Mr. Challoner]199-mr. challoner was the first to break the impressive pause .

" [I]199-mr. challoner 'm not [a speaker]3304-a speaker , [sir]3252-sir , "[199-mr. challoner] [he]199-mr. challoner observed slowly , " but [I]199-mr. challoner 've got a good deal of feeling somewheres ; and [you]3252-sir 'll allow [me]199-mr. challoner to say that [I]199-mr. challoner feel [your]3252-sir words - [I]199-mr. challoner think they 're right true . Besides , it 's a downward line , and curiously free from obstructions . "[199-mr. challoner]

" Bravo , [John]209-john ! "[156-mrs. challoner] exclaimed [Mrs. Challoner]156-mrs. challoner . " [You]209-john are actually corning out ! [I]156-mrs. challoner never heard [you]209-john indulge in similes before . "[156-mrs. challoner]

[We]1301-we all laughed . [Zara]152-zara , [I]0-i thought , was especially merry , and looked [her]152-zara loveliest . [She]152-zara made [an excellent hostess]1302-an excellent hostess , and exerted [herself]152-zara to the utmost to charm - an effort in which [she]152-zara easily succeeded .

The shadow on the face of [[her]152-zara brother]703-her brother had not disappeared , and once or twice [I]0-i noticed that [Father Paul]204-father paul looked at [him]703-her brother with a certain kindly anxiety .

The dinner approached its end . The dessert , with its luxurious dishes of rare fruit , such as peaches , plantains , hothouse grapes , and even strawberries , was served , and with it a delicious , sparkling , topaz - tinted wine of Eastern origin called [Krula]75-krula , which was poured out to [us]1301-we in Venetian glass goblets , wherein lay diamond - like lumps of ice . The air was so exceedingly oppressive that evening that [we]1301-we found this beverage most refreshing . When [Zara]152-zara 's goblet was filled , [she]152-zara held it up smiling , and said :

" [I]152-zara have a toast to propose . "[152-zara]

" Hear , hear ! "[1304-the gentlemen] murmured [the gentlemen]1304-the gentlemen , [Heliobas]104-heliobas excepted .

" To [our]1301-we next merry meeting ! "[152-zara] and as [she]152-zara said this [she]152-zara kissed the rim of the cup , and made a sign as though wafting it towards [[her]152-zara brother]703-her brother .

[He]703-her brother started as if from a reverie , seized [his]703-her brother glass , and drained off its contents to the last drop .

[Everyone]1821-everyone responded with heartiness to [Zara]152-zara 's toast and then [Colonel Everard]92-colonel everard proposed the health of [the fair hostess]1307-the fair hostess , which was drunk with enthusiasm .

After this [Zara]152-zara gave the signal , and [all the ladies]1308-all the ladies rose to adjourn to [the drawing - room]2283-the drawing - room . " Remember [Azul]106-azul ! "[0-i]

[He]104-heliobas made no answer , and there was no opportunity to say more , as [I]0-i had to follow [Zara]152-zara . But [I]0-i felt very anxious , though [I]0-i scarcely knew why , and [I]0-i lingered at the door and glanced back at [him]104-heliobas . As [I]0-i did so , a low , rumbling sound , like chariot - wheels rolling afar off , broke suddenly on [our]1310-our ears .

" Thunder , "[199-mr. challoner] remarked [Mr. Challoner]199-mr. challoner quietly . " [I]199-mr. challoner thought [we]1310-our should have it . It has been unnaturally warm all day . A good storm will clear the air . "[199-mr. challoner]

In [my]0-i brief backward look at [Heliobas]104-heliobas , [I]0-i noted that when that far - distant thunder sounded , [he]104-heliobas grew very pale . Why ? [He]104-heliobas was certainly not one to have any dread of a storm - [he]104-heliobas was absolutely destitute of fear . [I]0-i went into [the drawing - room]2283-the drawing - room with a hesitating step - [my]0-i instincts were all awake and beginning to warn [me]0-i , and [I]0-i murmured softly a prayer to that strong , invisible majestic spirit which [I]0-i knew must be near [me]0-i - [[my]0-i guardian Angel]1312-my guardian angel . [I]0-i was answered instantly - [my]0-i foreboding grew into a positive certainty that some danger menaced [Heliobas]104-heliobas , and that if [I]0-i desired to be [[his]104-heliobas friend]856-his friend , [I]0-i must be prepared for an emergency . Receiving this , as all such impressions should be received , as a direct message sent [me]0-i for [my]0-i guidance , [I]0-i grew calmer , and braced up [my]0-i energies to oppose SOMETHING , though [I]0-i knew not what .

[Zara]152-zara was showing [[her]152-zara lady]1314-her lady - visitors a large album of Italian photographs , and explaining them as [she]152-zara turned the leaves . As [I]0-i entered [the room]385-the room , [she]152-zara said eagerly to [me]0-i :

" Did [you]152-zara hear the thunder just now ? "[0-i] [I]0-i asked irrelevantly .

[Zara]152-zara smiled , and gently repeated [her]152-zara request to [me]0-i for some music - a request in which [Mrs. Challoner]156-mrs. challoner and [[her]156-mrs. challoner daughters]1281-her daughters eagerly joined . As [I]0-i went to the piano [I]0-i thought of [Edgar Allan Poe]231-edgar allan poe 's exquisite poem :

"[231-edgar allan poe]

As [I]0-i poised [my]0-i fingers above the keys of the instrument , another long , low , ominous roll of thunder swept up from the distance and made [the room]385-the room tremble .

" Play - play , for goodness ' sake ! "[152-zara] exclaimed [Mrs. Everard]152-zara ; " and then [we]3316-we shall not be obliged to fix [our]3316-we attention on the approaching storm ! "[152-zara]

[I]0-i played a few soft opening arpeggio passages , while [Zara]152-zara seated [herself]152-zara in an easy - chair near the window , and [the other ladies]1318-the other ladies arranged [themselves]1318-the other ladies on sofas and ottomans to [their]1318-the other ladies satisfaction . [The room]385-the room was exceedingly close : and the scent of the flowers that were placed about in profusion was almost too sweet and overpowering .

" And [they]1318-the other ladies say the starry choir And the other listening things That [Israfeli]232-israfeli 's fire Is owing to that lyre , By which lie sits and sings , - The trembling living wire Of those unusual strings . "[152-zara]

How these verses haunted [me]0-i ! With them floating in [my]0-i mind , [I]0-i played - losing [myself]0-i in mazes of melody , and travelling harmoniously in and out of the different keys with that sense of perfect joy known only to [those who can improvise with ease]1320-those who can improvise with ease , and catch the unwritten music of nature , which always appeals most strongly to emotions that are unspoilt by contact with [the world]264-the world , and which are quick to respond to what is purely instinctive art . [I]0-i soon became thoroughly absorbed , and forgot that there were [any persons present]1322-any persons present . In fancy [I]0-i imagined [myself]0-i again in view of the glory of the Electric Ring - again [I]0-i seemed to behold the opaline radiance of the Central Sphere :

" Where [Love]105-the infinite love 's [a grown - up God]3317-a grown - up god , Where the Houri glances are Imbued with all the beauty Which [we]3318-we worship in a star . "[0-i]

By - and - by [I]0-i found [my]0-i fingers at the work of tenderly unravelling a little skein of major melody , as soft and childlike as the innocent babble of a small brooklet flowing under ferns . [I]0-i followed this airy suggestion obediently , till it led [me]0-i of itself to its fitting end , when [I]0-i ceased playing . [I]0-i was greeted by a little burst of applause , and looking up , saw that [all the gentlemen]1323-all the gentlemen had come in from [the dining - room]1287-the dining - room , and were standing near [me]0-i . [The stately figure of [Heliobas]104-heliobas]1325-the stately figure of heliobas was the most prominent in [the group]1326-the group ; [he]104-heliobas stood erect , one hand resting lightly on the framework of the piano , and [his]104-heliobas eyes met [mine]0-i fixedly .

" [You]0-i were inspired , "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas said with a grave smile , addressing [me]0-i ; " [you]0-i did not observe [our]1327-us entrance . "[104-heliobas]

[I]0-i was about to reply , when a loud , appalling crash of thunder rattled above [us]1327-us , as if [some huge building]1328-some huge building had suddenly fallen into ruins . It startled [us]1327-us all into silence for a moment , and [we]1327-us looked into [each other]2173-each other 's faces with a certain degree of awe .

" That was a good one , "[199-mr. challoner] remarked [Mr. Challoner]199-mr. challoner . " There was nothing undecided about that clap . [Its]3319-its mind was made up . "[199-mr. challoner]

[Zara]152-zara suddenly rose from [her]152-zara seat , and drew aside the window - curtains .

" [I]152-zara wonder if it is raining , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara said .

[Amy Everard]93-amy uttered a little shriek of dismay .

" Oh , do n't open the blinds ! "[93-amy] [she]93-amy exclaimed . " It is really dangerous ! "[93-amy]

[Heliobas]104-heliobas glanced at [her]93-amy with a little sarcastic smile .

[She]93-amy would , [I]0-i believe , have gladly taken refuge in the coal - cellar had [he]104-heliobas offered [it]1330-it . [Zara]152-zara , in the meantime , who had not heard [Mrs. Everard]152-zara 's exclamation of fear , had drawn up one of the blinds , and stood silently looking out upon the night . Instinctively [we]1331-we all joined [her]152-zara , with the exception of [Amy]93-amy , and looked out also . The skies were very dark ; a faint moaning wind stirred the tops of the leafless trees ; but there was no rain . A dry volcanic heat pervaded the atmosphere - in fact [we]1331-we all felt the air so stifling , that [Heliobas]104-heliobas threw open the window altogether , saying , as [he]104-heliobas did so :

" In a thunderstorm , it is safer to have the windows open than shut ; besides , [one]272-one can not suffocate . "[104-heliobas]

A brilliant glare of light flashed suddenly upon [our]1331-we vision . The heavens seemed torn open from end to end , and a broad lake of pale blue fire lay quivering in the heart of the mountainous black clouds - for a second only . An on - rushing , ever - increasing , rattling roar of thunder ensued , that seemed to shake [the very earth]1332-the very earth , and all was again darkness .

" This is magnificent ! "[156-mrs. challoner] cries [Mrs. Challoner]156-mrs. challoner , who , with [[her]156-mrs. challoner family]1333-her family , had travelled a great deal , and was quite accustomed to hurricanes and other inconveniences caused by the unaccommodating behaviour of the elements . " [I]156-mrs. challoner do n't think [I]156-mrs. challoner ever saw anything like it , [John]209-john dear , even that storm [we]1331-we saw at [Chamounix]77-chamounix was not any better than this . "[156-mrs. challoner]

" Well , "[317-her husband] returned [[her]156-mrs. challoner husband]317-her husband meditatively , " [you]159-effie see [we]1331-we had [the snow mountains]3323-the snow mountains there , and the effect was pretty lively . " That 's it ! "[317-her husband] [he]317-her husband replied . " [I]317-her husband opine that [Job]184-job was pretty correct in [his]3325-his ideas - do n't [you]1335-the priest , [reverend sir]3326-reverend sir ? "[317-her husband] turning to [Father Paul]204-father paul .

" [That lady]3327-that lady - [Mrs. Everard]93-amy - is going to sing or play , [I]1335-the priest think , "[1335-the priest] [he]1335-the priest observed . " Shall [we]3328-we not keep silence ? "[1335-the priest]

[I]0-i looked towards [Amy]93-amy in some surprise . [I]0-i knew [she]93-amy sang very prettily , but [I]0-i had thought [she]93-amy was rendered too nervous by the storm to do aught but sit quiet in [her]93-amy chair . However , there [she]93-amy was at the piano , and in another moment [her]93-amy fresh , sweet mezzo - soprano rang softly through [the room]385-the room in [Tosti]233-tosti 's plaintive song , " Good - bye ! "[93-amy] [We]1337-we listened , but [none of [us]1337-we]1338-none of us moved from the open window where [we]1337-we still inhaled what air there was , and watched the lowering sky .

" Hush ! a voice from [the far - away]3329-the far - away , ' Listen and learn , ' it seems to say ; ' All the to - morrows shall be as to - day , ' "[93-amy]

sang [Amy]93-amy with pathetic sweetness . [Zara]152-zara suddenly moved , as if oppressed , from [her]152-zara position among [us]1337-we as [we]1337-we stood clustered together , and stepped out through the French window into [the outside balcony]1339-the outside balcony , [her]152-zara head uncovered to the night .

" [You]93-amy will catch cold ! "[156-mrs. challoner] [Mrs. Challoner]156-mrs. challoner and [I]0-i both called to [her]93-amy simultaneously . [She]93-amy shook [her]93-amy head , smiling back at [us]1337-we ; and folding [her]93-amy arms lightly on the stone balustrade , leaned there and looked up at the clouds .

" The link must break , and the lamp must die ; Good - bye to [Hope]234-hope ! Good - bye - good - bye ! "[93-amy]

[Amy]93-amy 's voice was a peculiarly thrilling one , and on this occasion sounded with more than its usual tenderness . What with [her]93-amy singing and the invisible presence of the storm , an utter silence possessed [us]1337-we - [not one of [us]1337-we]1340-not one of us cared to move .

[Heliobas]104-heliobas once stepped to [[his]104-heliobas sister]2320-his sister 's side in [the open balcony]1342-the open balcony , and said something , as [I]0-i thought , to warn [her]2320-his sister against taking cold ; but it was a very brief whisper , and [he]104-heliobas almost immediately returned to [his]104-heliobas place amongst [us]1337-we . [Zara]152-zara looked very lovely out there ; the light coming from the interior of [the room]385-the room glistened softly on the sheen of [her]152-zara satin dress and its ornaments of pearls ; and the electric stone on [her]152-zara bosom shone faintly , like a star on a rainy evening . [Her]152-zara beautiful face , turned upwards to the angry sky , was half in light and half in shade ; a smile parted [her]152-zara lips , and [her]152-zara eyes were bright with a look of interest and expectancy . Another sudden glare , and the clouds were again broken asunder ; but this time in a jagged and hasty manner , as though a naked sword had been thrust through them and immediately withdrawn .

" That was a nasty flash , "[92-colonel everard] said [Colonel Everard]92-colonel everard , with an observant glance at the lovely Juliet - like figure on [the balcony]1344-the balcony . " [Mademoiselle]98-mademoiselle , had [you]152-zara not better come in ? "[92-colonel everard]

" When it begins to rain [I]152-zara will come in , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara said , without changing [her]152-zara posture . " [I]152-zara hear the singing so well out here . Besides , [I]152-zara love the storm . "[152-zara]

A tumultuous crash of thunder , tremendous for its uproar and the length of time it was prolonged , made [us]1337-we look at [each other]2173-each other again with anxious faces .

" What are [we]1337-we waiting for ? Oh , [my]92-colonel everard heart ! Kiss [me]92-colonel everard straight on the brows and part ! Again ! again , [my]92-colonel everard heart , [my]92-colonel everard heart ! What are [we]1337-we waiting for , [you]3330-you and [I]92-colonel everard ? A pleading look - a stifled cry ! Good - bye for ever - - "[92-colonel everard]

Horror ! what was that ? A lithe swift serpent of fire twisting venomously through the dark heavens ! [Zara]152-zara raised [her]152-zara arms , looked up , smiled , and fell - senseless ! With such appalling suddenness that [we]1337-we had scarcely recovered from the blinding terror of that forked lightning - flash , when [we]1337-we saw [her]152-zara lying prone before [us]1337-we on [the balcony]1344-the balcony where one instant before [she]152-zara had stood erect and smiling ! With exclamations of alarm and distress [we]1337-we lifted and bore [her]152-zara within [the room]385-the room and laid [her]152-zara tenderly down upon the nearest sofa . At that moment a deafening , terrific thunder - clap - one only - as if a huge bombshell had burst in the air , shook the ground under [our]1337-we feet ; and then with a swish and swirl of long pent - up and suddenly - released wrath , down came the rain .

[Amy]93-amy 's voice died away in a last " Good - bye ! "[93-amy] and [she]152-zara rushed from the piano , with pale face and trembling lips , gasping out :

" What has happened ? What is the matter ? "[152-zara]

" [She]152-zara has been stunned by a lightning - flash , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , trying to speak calmly , while [I]0-i loosened [Zara]152-zara 's dress and sprinkled [her]152-zara forehead with eau - de - Cologne from a scent - bottle [Mrs. Challoner]156-mrs. challoner had handed to [me]0-i . " [She]152-zara will recover in a few minutes . "[156-mrs. challoner]

But [my]0-i limbs trembled under [me]0-i , and tears , in spite of [myself]0-i , forced their way into [my]0-i eyes .

[Heliobas]104-heliobas meanwhile - [his]104-heliobas countenance white and set as a marble mask - shut the window fiercely , pulled down the blind , and drew the heavy silken curtains close . [He]104-heliobas then approached [[his]104-heliobas sister]2320-his sister 's senseless form , and , taking [her]152-zara wrist tenderly , felt for [her]152-zara pulse . [We]1349-we looked on in the deepest anxiety . [The Challoner girls]1350-the challoner girls shivered with terror , and began to cry . [Mrs. Everard]152-zara , with more self - possession , dipped a handkerchief in cold water and laid it on [Zara]152-zara 's temples ; but no faint sigh parted the set yet smiling lips - no sign of life was visible . All this while the rain swept down in gusty torrents and rattled furiously against the window - panes ; while the wind , no longer a moan , had risen into a shriek , as of baffled yet vindictive anger . At last [Heliobas]104-heliobas spoke .

" [I]104-heliobas should be glad of other medical skill than [my]104-heliobas own , "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas said , in low and stifled accents . " This may be a long fainting - fit . "[104-heliobas]

[Mr. Challoner]199-mr. challoner at once proffered [his]199-mr. challoner services .

" [I]104-heliobas 'll go for [you]1350-the challoner girls anywhere [you]1350-the challoner girls like , "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas said cheerily ; " and [I]104-heliobas think [[my]104-heliobas wife]3331-my wife and [daughters]3332-daughters had better come with [me]104-heliobas . [[Our]1349-we carriage]3333-our carriage is sure to be in waiting . It will be necessary for [the lady]3334-the lady to have perfect quiet when [she]3334-the lady recovers , and [visitors]3335-visitors are best away . [You]1350-the challoner girls need not be alarmed , [I]104-heliobas am sure . By [her]3334-the lady colour it is evident [she]3334-the lady is only in a swoon . What [doctor]3336-doctor shall [I]104-heliobas send ? "[104-heliobas]

[Heliobas]104-heliobas named one [Dr. Morini]235-dr. morini , [10 , Avenue de l'Alma]1351-10 , avenue de l'alma .

" Right ! [He]3336-doctor shall be [here]1773-here straight . Come , [wife]3338-wife - come , [girls]3248-girls ! [Mrs. Everard]152-zara , [we]3340-we 'll send back [[our]3340-we carriage]3333-our carriage for [you]152-zara and [the Colonel]1857-the colonel . Good - night ! [We]3340-we 'll call to - morrow and inquire after [mademoiselle]98-mademoiselle . "[104-heliobas]

[Heliobas]104-heliobas gratefully pressed [his]104-heliobas hand as [he]104-heliobas withdrew , and [[his]104-heliobas wife]322-his wife and [daughters]3332-daughters , with whispered farewells , followed [him]104-heliobas . [[We]1354-we who were left behind all]1355-we who were left behind all remained near [Zara]152-zara , doing everything [we]1354-we could think of to restore animation to that senseless form .

[Some of [the servants]717-the servants]1356-some of the servants , too , hearing what had happened , gathered in a little cluster at [the drawing - room]2283-the drawing - room door , looking with pale and alarmed faces at the death - like figure of [[their]1356-some of the servants beautiful mistress]1359-their beautiful mistress . Half an hour or more must have passed in this manner ; within [the room]385-the room there was a dreadful silence - but outside the rain poured down in torrents , and the savage wind howled and tore at the windows like [a besieging army]1361-a besieging army . Suddenly [Amy Everard]93-amy , who had been quietly and skilfully assisting [me]0-i in rubbing [Zara]152-zara 's hands and bathing [her]152-zara forehead , grew faint , staggered , and would have fallen had not [[her]152-zara husband]317-her husband caught [her]152-zara on [his]317-her husband arm .

" [I]152-zara am frightened , "[152-zara] [she]152-zara gasped . " [I]152-zara can not bear it - [she]152-zara looks so still , and [she]152-zara is growing - rigid , like a corpse ! Oh , if [she]152-zara should be dead ! "[152-zara] And [she]152-zara hid [her]152-zara face on [[her]152-zara husband]317-her husband 's breast .

At that moment [we]1364-we heard the grating of wheels on the gravel outside ; it was [[the Challoners]177-the challoners ' carriage]1365-the challoners ' carriage returned . [The coachman]661-the coachman , after depositing [[his]661-the coachman master]1772-his master and [family]1368-family at [the Grand Hotel]629-the grand hotel , had driven rapidly back in the teeth of the stinging sleet and rain to bring the message that [Dr. Morini]235-dr. morini would be with [us]1364-we as soon as possible .

" Then , "[92-colonel everard] whispered [Colonel Everard]92-colonel everard gently to [me]0-i , " [I]92-colonel everard 'll take [Amy]93-amy [home]1856-home . [She]93-amy is thoroughly upset , and it 's no use having [her]93-amy going off into hysterics . [I]92-colonel everard 'll call with [Challoner]78-challoner to - morrow ; "[92-colonel everard] and with a kindly parting nod of encouragement to [[us]1364-we all]1370-us all , [he]661-the coachman slipped softly out of [the room]385-the room , half leading , half carrying [[his]661-the coachman trembling wife]1372-his trembling wife ; and in a couple of minutes [we]1364-we heard [the carriage]2340-the carriage again drive away .

Left alone at last with [Heliobas]104-heliobas and [Father Paul]204-father paul , [I]0-i , kneeling at the side of [[my]0-i darling [Zara]152-zara]1374-my darling zara , looked into [their]1375-their faces for comfort , but found none . The dry - eyed despair on the countenance of [Heliobas]104-heliobas pierced [me]0-i to the heart ; the pitying , solemn expression of [the venerable priest]1376-the venerable priest touched [me]0-i as with icy cold . The lovely , marble - like whiteness and stillness of the figure before [me]0-i filled [me]0-i with a vague terror . Making a strong effort to control [my]0-i voice , [I]0-i called , in a low , clear tone :

" [Zara]152-zara ! [Zara]152-zara ! "[0-i]

No sign - not the faintest flicker of an eyelash ! Only the sound of the falling rain and the moaning wind - the thunder had long ago ceased . Suddenly a something attracted [my]0-i gaze , which first surprised and then horrified [me]0-i . The jewel - the electric stone on [Zara]152-zara 's bosom no longer shone ! It was like a piece of dull unpolished pebble . Grasping at the meaning of this , with overwhelming instinctive rapidity , [I]0-i sprang up and caught the arm of [Heliobas]104-heliobas .

" [You]152-zara - [you]152-zara ! "[0-i] [I]0-i whispered hurriedly . " [YOU]152-zara can restore [her]152-zara ! Do as [you]152-zara did with [Prince Ivan]153-prince ivan ; [you]152-zara can - [you]152-zara must ! That stone [she]152-zara wears - the light has gone out of it . If that means - and [I]0-i am sure it does - that life has for a little while gone out of [HER]152-zara , [YOU]152-zara can bring it back . Quick - Quick ! [You]152-zara have the power ! "[0-i]

[He]104-heliobas looked at [me]0-i with burning grief - haunted eyes ; and a sigh that was almost a groan escaped [his]104-heliobas lips .

" [I]104-heliobas have NO power , "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas said . " Not over [her]152-zara . [I]104-heliobas told [you]0-i [she]152-zara was dominated by a higher force than [mine]104-heliobas . What can [I]104-heliobas do ? Nothing - worse than nothing - [I]104-heliobas am utterly helpless . "[104-heliobas]

[I]0-i stared at [him]104-heliobas in a kind of desperate horror .

" Do [you]104-heliobas mean to tell [me]0-i , "[0-i] [I]0-i said slowly , " that [she]152-zara is dead - really dead ? "[0-i]

[He]104-heliobas was about to answer , when [one of [the watching servants]1378-the watching servants]1377-one of the watching servants announced in a low tone : " [Dr. Morini]235-dr. morini . "[1377-one of the watching servants]

[The new - comer]1379-the new - comer was [a wiry , keen - eyed little Italian]1380-a wiry , keen - eyed little italian ; [his]1379-the new - comer movements were quick , decisive , and all to the point of action . The first thing [he]1379-the new - comer did was to scatter [the little group of servants]1381-the little group of servants right and left , and send [them]1381-the little group of servants about [their]1381-the little group of servants business . The next , to close the doors of [the room]385-the room against all intrusion . [He]1379-the new - comer then came straight up to [Heliobas]104-heliobas , and pressing [his]1379-the new - comer hand in a friendly manner , said briefly :

" How and when did this happen ? "[1379-the new - comer]

[Heliobas]104-heliobas told [him]1379-the new - comer in as few words as possible . [Dr. Morini]235-dr. morini then bent over [Zara]152-zara 's lifeless form , and examined [her]152-zara features attentively . [He]235-dr. morini laid [his]235-dr. morini car against [her]152-zara heart and listened . Finally , [he]235-dr. morini caught sight of the round , lustreless pebble hanging at [her]152-zara neck suspended by its strings of pearls . Very gently [he]235-dr. morini moved this aside ; looked , and beckoned [us]1383-us to come and look also . Exactly on the spot where the electric stone had rested , a small circular mark , like a black bruise , tainted the fair soft skin - a mark no larger than a small finger - ring .

" Death by electricity , "[235-dr. morini] said [Dr. Morini]235-dr. morini quietly . " Must have been instantaneous . The lightning - flash , or downward electric current , lodged itself here , where this mark is , and passed directly through the heart . Perfectly painless , but of course fatal . [She]152-zara has been dead some time . "[235-dr. morini]

And , replacing the stone ornament in its former position , [he]235-dr. morini stepped back with a suggestive glance at [Father Paul]204-father paul . [I]0-i listened and saw - but [I]0-i was in a state of stupefaction . Dead ? [My]0-i beautiful , gay , strong [Zara DEAD]152-zara ? Impossible ! [I]0-i knelt beside [her]152-zara ; [I]0-i called [her]152-zara again and again by every endearing and tender name [I]0-i could think of ; [I]0-i kissed [her]152-zara sweet lips . Oh , they were cold as ice , and chilled [my]0-i blood ! As one in a dream , [I]0-i saw [Heliobas]104-heliobas advance ; [he]104-heliobas kissed [her]152-zara forehead and mouth ; [he]104-heliobas reverently unclasped the pearls from about [her]152-zara throat , and with [them]1384-them took off the electric stone . Then [Father Paul]204-father paul stepped slowly forward , and in place of that once brilliant gem , now so dim and destitute of fire , [he]204-father paul laid a crucifix upon the fair and gentle breast , motionless for ever .

At sight of this sacred symbol , some tense cord seemed to snap in [my]0-i brain , and [I]0-i cried out wildly :

" Oh , no , no ! Not that ! That is for the dead ; [Zara]152-zara is not dead ! It is all a mistake - a mistake ! [She]152-zara will be quite well presently ; and [she]152-zara will smile and tell [you]204-father paul how foolish [you]204-father paul were to think [her]152-zara dead ! Dead ? [She]152-zara can not be dead ; it is impossible - quite impossible ! "[0-i] And [I]0-i broke into a passion of sobs and tears .

Very gently and kindly [Dr. Morini]235-dr. morini drew [me]0-i away , and by dint of friendly persuasion , in which there was also a good deal of firm determination , led [me]0-i into [the hall]572-the hall , where [he]235-dr. morini made [me]0-i swallow a glass of wine . As [I]0-i could not control [my]0-i sobs , [he]235-dr. morini spoke with some sternness :

" [Mademoiselle]98-mademoiselle , [you]0-i can do no good by giving way in this manner . Death is a very beautiful and solemn thing , and it is irreverent to show unseemly passion in such a great Presence . [You]204-father paul loved [[your]204-father paul friend]1987-your friend - let it be a comfort to [you]204-father paul that [she]1987-your friend died painlessly . Control [yourself]204-father paul , in order to assist in rendering [her]1987-your friend the last few gentle services necessary ; and try to console [the desolate brother , who looks in real need of encouragement]3345-the desolate brother , who looks in real need of encouragement . "[235-dr. morini]

These last words roused [me]0-i . [I]0-i forced back [my]0-i tears , and dried [my]0-i eyes .

" [I]0-i will , [Dr. Morini]235-dr. morini , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , in a trembling voice . " [I]0-i am ashamed to be so weak . [I]0-i know what [I]0-i ought to do , and [I]0-i will do it . [You]235-dr. morini may trust [me]0-i . "[0-i]

[He]1386-he looked at [me]0-i approvingly .

" That is well , "[1386-he] [he]1386-he said briefly . " And now , as [I]1386-he am of no use [here]1773-here , [I]1386-he will say good - night . Remember , excessive grief is mere selfishness ; resignation is heroism . "[1386-he]

[He]1386-he was gone . [I]0-i nerved [myself]0-i to the task [I]0-i had before [me]0-i , and within an hour the fair casket of what had been [Zara]152-zara lay on an open bier in [the little chapel]818-the little chapel , lights burning round [it]1388-it , and flowers strewn above [it]1388-it in mournful profusion .

[We]1389-we left [her]152-zara body arrayed in its white satin garb ; the cluster of orange - blossoms [she]152-zara had gathered still bloomed upon the cold breast , where the crucifix lay ; but in the tresses of the long dark hair [I]0-i wove a wreath of lilies instead of the pearls [we]1389-we had undone .

And now [I]0-i knelt beside the bier absorbed in thought . [Some of [the weeping servants]1391-the weeping servants]1390-some of the weeping servants had assembled , and knelt about in little groups . The tall candles on the altar were lit , and [Father Paul]204-father paul , clad in mourning priestly vestments , prayed there in silence . The storm of rain and wind still raged without , and the windows of [the chapel]2310-the chapel shook and rattled with the violence of the tempest .

A distant clock struck ONE ! with a deep clang that echoed throughout [the house]2038-the house . [I]0-i shuddered . So short a time had elapsed since [Zara]152-zara had been alive and well ; now , [I]0-i could not bear to think that [she]152-zara was gone from [me]0-i for ever . For ever , did [I]0-i say ? No , not for ever - not so long as love exists - love that shall bring [us]1389-we together again in [that far - off Sphere]1394-that far - off sphere where - -

Hush ! what was that ? The sound of the organ ? [I]0-i looked around [me]0-i in startled wonderment . There was [no one seated at the instrument]1395-no one seated at the instrument ; it was shut close . The lights on the altar and round [the bier]1396-the bier burnt steadily ; the motionless figure of [the priest before the tabernacle]1397-the priest before the tabernacle ; [the praying servants of [the household]786-the household]1398-the praying servants of the household - all was unchanged . But certainly a flood of music rolled grandly on the ear - music that drowned for a moment the howling noise of the battering wind . [I]0-i rose softly , and touched one of [the kneeling domestics on the shoulder]1400-the kneeling domestics on the shoulder .

" Did [you]2044-the woman hear the organ ? "[0-i] [I]0-i said .

[The woman]2044-the woman looked up at [me]0-i with tearful , alarmed eyes .

" No , [mademoiselle]1745-mademoiselle . "[2044-the woman]

[I]0-i paused , listening . The music grew louder and louder , and surged round [me]0-i in waves of melody . Evidently [no one in]1402-no one in [the chapel]2310-the chapel heard it but [myself]0-i . [I]0-i looked about for [Heliobas]104-heliobas , but [he]104-heliobas had not entered . [He]104-heliobas was most probably in [[his]104-heliobas study]796-his study , whither [he]104-heliobas had retired to grieve in secret when [we]1405-we had borne [Zara]152-zara 's body to its present couch of dreamless sleep .

These sounds were meant for [me]0-i alone , then ? [I]0-i waited , and the music gradually died away ; and as [I]0-i resumed [my]0-i kneeling position by the bier all was again silence , save for the unabated raging of the storm .

A strange calmness now fell on [my]0-i spirits . Some invisible hand seemed to hold [me]0-i still and tearless . [Zara]152-zara was dead . [I]0-i realized it now . [I]0-i began to consider that [she]152-zara must have known [her]152-zara fate beforehand . This was what [she]152-zara had meant when [she]152-zara said [she]152-zara was going on a journey . The more [I]0-i thought of this the quieter [I]0-i became , and [I]0-i hid [my]0-i face in [my]0-i hands and prayed earnestly .

A touch roused [me]0-i - an imperative , burning touch . An airy brightness , like a light cloud with sunshine falling through it , hovered above [[Zara]152-zara 's bier]1406-zara 's bier ! [I]0-i gazed breathlessly ; [I]0-i could not move [my]0-i lips to utter a sound . A face looked at [me]0-i - a face angelically beautiful ! [It]1407-it smiled . [I]0-i stretched out [my]0-i hands ; [I]0-i struggled for speech , and managed to whisper :

" [Zara]152-zara , [Zara]152-zara ! [you]152-zara have come back ! "[0-i]

[Her]152-zara voice , so sweetly familiar , answered [me]0-i : " To life ? Ah , never , never again ! [I]152-zara am too happy to return . But save [him]1406-zara 's bier - save [[my]152-zara brother]676-my brother ! Go to [him]1406-zara 's bier ; [he]1406-zara 's bier is in danger ; to [you]0-i is given the rescue . Save [him]1406-zara 's bier ; and for [me]152-zara rejoice , and grieve no more ! "[152-zara]

The face vanished , the brightness faded , and [I]0-i sprang up from [my]0-i knees in haste . For one instant [I]0-i looked at the beautiful dead body of [the friend [I]0-i loved]1408-the friend i loved , with its set mouth and placid features , and then [I]0-i smiled . This was not [Zara]152-zara - [SHE]152-zara was alive and happy ; [this fair clay]1409-this fair clay was but clay doomed to perish , but [SHE]152-zara was imperishable .

" Save [him]1406-zara 's bier - save [[my]152-zara brother]676-my brother ! "[152-zara] These words rang in [my]0-i ears . [I]0-i hesitated no longer - [I]0-i determined to seek [Heliobas]104-heliobas at once . Swiftly and noiselessly [I]0-i slipped out of [the chapel]2310-the chapel . As the door swung behind [me]0-i [I]0-i heard a sound that first made [me]0-i stop in sudden alarm , and then hurry on with increased eagerness . There was no mistaking it - it was the clash of steel !

[CHAPTER XVI]237-chapter xvi .

[A STRUGGLE FOR THE MASTERY]238-a struggle for the mastery .

[I]0-i rushed to [the study]1411-the study - door , tore aside the velvet hangings , and faced [Heliobas]104-heliobas and [Prince Ivan Petroffsky]153-prince ivan . [They]1412-they held drawn weapons , which [they]1412-they lowered at [my]0-i sudden entrance , and paused irresolutely .

" What are [you]104-heliobas doing ? "[0-i] [I]0-i cried , addressing [myself]0-i to [Heliobas]104-heliobas . " With the dead body of [[your]104-heliobas sister]2308-your sister in [the house]2038-the house [you]104-heliobas can fight ! [You]104-heliobas , too ! "[0-i] and [I]0-i looked reproachfully at [Prince Ivan]153-prince ivan ; " [you]104-heliobas also can desecrate the sanctity of death , and yet - [you]104-heliobas LOVED [her]2308-your sister ! "[0-i]

[The Prince]708-the prince spoke not , but clenched [his]708-the prince sword - hilt with a fiercer grasp , and glared wildly on [[his]708-the prince opponent]1414-his opponent . [His]104-heliobas eyes had a look of madness in them - [his]104-heliobas dress was much disordered - [his]104-heliobas hair wet with drops of rain - [his]104-heliobas face ghastly white , and [his]104-heliobas whole demeanour was that of [a man distraught with grief and passion]1415-a man distraught with grief and passion . But [he]104-heliobas uttered no word . [Heliobas]104-heliobas spoke ; [he]104-heliobas was coldly calm , and balanced [his]104-heliobas sword lightly on [his]104-heliobas open hand as if it were a toy .

" [This GENTLEMAN]3352-this gentleman , "[104-heliobas] [he]104-heliobas said , with deliberate emphasis , " happened , on [his]104-heliobas way thither , to meet [Dr. Morini]235-dr. morini , who informed [him]104-heliobas of the fatal catastrophe which has caused [[my]104-heliobas sister]614-my sister 's death . Instead of respecting the sacredness of [my]104-heliobas solitude under the circumstances , [he]104-heliobas thrust [himself]104-heliobas rudely into [my]104-heliobas presence , and , before [I]104-heliobas could address [him]104-heliobas , struck [me]104-heliobas violently in the face , and accused [me]104-heliobas of being [[my]104-heliobas sister]614-my sister 's murderer . Such conduct can only meet with one reply . [I]104-heliobas gave [him]104-heliobas [his]104-heliobas choice of weapons : [he]104-heliobas chose swords . [Our]3355-our combat has just begun - [we]3355-our are anxious to resume it ; therefore if [you]1416-he , [mademoiselle]98-mademoiselle , will have the goodness to retire - - "[104-heliobas]

[I]0-i interrupted [him]1416-he .

" [I]0-i shall certainly not retire , "[0-i] [I]0-i said firmly . " This behaviour on both [your]1416-he parts is positive madness . [Prince Ivan]153-prince ivan , please to listen to [me]0-i . The circumstances of [Zara]152-zara 's death were plainly witnessed by [me]0-i and [others]324-others - [[her]152-zara brother]703-her brother is as innocent of having caused it as [I]0-i am . "[0-i]

And [I]0-i recounted to [him]1416-he quietly all that had happened during that fatal and eventful evening . [He]1416-he listened moodily , tracing out the pattern of the carpet with the point of [his]1416-he sword . When [I]0-i had finished [he]1416-he looked up , and a bitter smile crossed [his]1416-he features .

" [I]1416-he wonder , [mademoiselle]98-mademoiselle , "[1416-he] [he]1416-he said , " that [[your]98-mademoiselle residence in [this accursed house]3359-this accursed house]3358-your residence in this accursed house has not taught [you]98-mademoiselle better . [I]1416-he quite believe all [you]98-mademoiselle say , that [Zara]152-zara , [unfortunate girl that [she]152-zara was]3360-unfortunate girl that she was , received [her]152-zara death by a lightning - flash . But answer [me]1416-he this : Who made [her]152-zara capable of attracting atmospheric electricity ? Who charged [her]152-zara beautiful delicate body with a vile compound of electrical fluid , so that [she]152-zara was as a living magnet , bound to draw towards [herself]152-zara electricity in all its forms ? Who tampered with [her]152-zara fine brain and made [her]152-zara imagine [herself]152-zara allied to a spirit of air ? Who but [HE]1416-he - [HE]1416-he ! - yonder unscrupulous wretch ! - [he]1416-he who in pursuit of [his]1416-he miserable science , practised [his]1416-he most dangerous experiments on [[his]1416-he sister]2320-his sister , regardless of [her]152-zara health , [her]152-zara happiness , [her]152-zara life ! [I]1416-he say [he]1416-he is [[her]152-zara murderer]3362-her murderer - [[her]152-zara remorseless murderer]3363-her remorseless murderer , and [a thrice - damned villain]3364-a thrice - damned villain ! "[1416-he]

And [he]1417-he sprang forward to renew the combat . [I]0-i stepped quietly , unflinchingly between [him]1417-he and [Heliobas]104-heliobas .

" Stop ! "[0-i] [I]0-i exclaimed ; " this can not go on . [Zara]152-zara [herself]152-zara forbids it ! "[0-i]

[The Prince]708-the prince paused , and looked at [me]0-i in a sort of stupefaction .

" [Zara]152-zara forbids it ! "[708-the prince] [he]708-the prince muttered . " What do [you]0-i mean ? "[708-the prince]

" [I]0-i mean , "[0-i] [I]0-i went on , " that [I]0-i have seen [Zara]152-zara since [her]152-zara death ; [I]0-i have spoken to [her]152-zara . [She]152-zara [herself]152-zara sent [me]0-i here . "[0-i]

[Prince Ivan]153-prince ivan stared , and then burst into a fit of wild laughter .

" [Little fool]3365-little fool ! "[153-prince ivan] [he]153-prince ivan cried to [me]0-i ; " [he]153-prince ivan has maddened [you]0-i too , then ! [You]0-i are also [a victim]3366-a victim ! Then pushing [me]0-i roughly aside , [he]153-prince ivan cast away [his]153-prince ivan sword , and shouted to [Heliobas]104-heliobas :

" Hand to hand , [villain]3368-villain ! No more of these toy - weapons ! Hand to hand ! "[153-prince ivan]

[Heliobas]104-heliobas instantly threw down [his]104-heliobas sword also , and rushing forward simultaneously , [they]1419-they closed together in savage conflict . [Heliobas]104-heliobas was the taller and more powerful of [the two]1420-the two , but [Prince Ivan]153-prince ivan seemed imbued with the spirit of a hundred devils , and sprang at [[his]153-prince ivan opponent]1414-his opponent 's throat with the silent breathless ferocity of a tiger . At first [Heliobas]104-heliobas appeared to be simply on the defensive , and [his]104-heliobas agile , skilful movements were all used to parry and ward off the other 's grappling eagerness . But as [I]0-i watched the struggle , [myself]0-i speechless and powerless , [I]0-i saw [his]153-prince ivan face change . Instead of its calm and almost indifferent expression , there came a look which was completely foreign to it - a look of savage determination bordering on positive cruelty . In a moment [I]0-i saw what was taking place in [his]153-prince ivan mind . The animal passions of [the mere MAN]1422-the mere man were aroused - the spiritual force was utterly forgotten . The excitement of the contest was beginning to tell , and the desire of victory was dominant in the breast of [him]153-prince ivan whose ideas were generally - and should have been now - those of patient endurance and large generosity . The fight grew closer , hotter , and more terrible . Suddenly [the Prince]708-the prince swerved aside and fell , and within a second [Heliobas]104-heliobas held [him]153-prince ivan down , pressing one knee firmly against [his]153-prince ivan chest . From [my]0-i point of observation [I]0-i noted with alarm that little by little [Ivan]153-prince ivan ceased [his]153-prince ivan violent efforts to rise , and that [he]153-prince ivan kept [his]153-prince ivan eyes fixed on the overshadowing face of [[his]153-prince ivan foe]1424-his foe with an unnatural and curious pertinacity . [I]0-i stepped forward . [Heliobas]104-heliobas pressed [his]104-heliobas whole weight heavily down on [the young man]713-the young man 's prostrate body , while with both hands [he]104-heliobas held [him]713-the young man by the shoulders , and gazed with terrific meaning into [his]713-the young man fast - paling countenance . [Ivan]153-prince ivan 's lips turned blue ; [his]153-prince ivan eyes appeared to start from their sockets ; [his]153-prince ivan throat rattled . The spell that held [me]0-i silent was broken ; a flash of light , a flood of memory swept over [my]0-i intelligence . [I]0-i knew that [Heliobas]104-heliobas was exciting the whole battery of [his]104-heliobas inner electric force , and that thus employed for the purposes of vengeance , it must infallibly cause death . [I]0-i found [my]0-i speech at last .

" [Heliobas]104-heliobas ! "[0-i] [I]0-i cried " Remember , remember [Azul]106-azul ! When Death lies like a gift in [your]153-prince ivan hand , withhold it . Withhold it , [Heliobas]104-heliobas ; and give Life instead ! "[0-i]

[He]153-prince ivan started at the sound of [my]0-i voice , and looked up . A strong shudder shook [his]153-prince ivan frame . Very slowly , very reluctantly , [he]153-prince ivan relaxed [his]153-prince ivan position ; [he]153-prince ivan rose from [his]153-prince ivan kneeling posture on [the Prince]708-the prince 's breast - [he]153-prince ivan left [him]153-prince ivan and stood upright . [Ivan]153-prince ivan at the same moment heaved a deep sigh , and closed [his]153-prince ivan eyes , apparently insensible .

Gradually one by one the hard lines faded out of the face of [Heliobas]104-heliobas , and [his]153-prince ivan old expression of soft and grave beneficence came back to it as graciously as sunlight after rain . [He]153-prince ivan turned to [me]0-i , and bent [his]153-prince ivan head in a sort of reverential salutation .

" [I]153-prince ivan thank and bless [you]0-i , "[153-prince ivan] [he]153-prince ivan said ; " [you]0-i reminded [me]153-prince ivan in time ! Another moment and it would have been too late . [You]0-i have saved [me]153-prince ivan . "[153-prince ivan]

" Give [him]153-prince ivan [his]153-prince ivan life , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , pointing to [Ivan]153-prince ivan .

" [He]153-prince ivan has it , "[104-heliobas] returned [Heliobas]104-heliobas ; " [I]104-heliobas have not taken it from [him]153-prince ivan , thank [God]101-god ! [He]153-prince ivan provoked [me]104-heliobas ; [I]104-heliobas regret it . [I]104-heliobas should have been more patient with [him]153-prince ivan . [He]153-prince ivan will revive immediately . [I]104-heliobas leave [him]153-prince ivan to [your]0-i care . In dealing with [him]153-prince ivan , [I]104-heliobas ought to have remembered that human passion like [his]153-prince ivan , unguided by spiritual knowledge , was to be met with pity and forbearance . As it is , however , [he]153-prince ivan is safe . For [me]104-heliobas , [I]104-heliobas will go and pray for [Zara]152-zara 's pardon , and that of [[my]104-heliobas wronged [Azul]106-azul]3369-my wronged azul . "[104-heliobas]

As [he]1427-i uttered the last words , [he]1427-i started , looked up , and smiled .

" [[My]1427-i beautiful one]3370-my beautiful one ! [Thou]3371-thou HAST pardoned [me]1427-i ? [Thou]3371-thou wilt love [me]1427-i still ? And as [one walking in sleep]1428-one walking in sleep , [he]1427-i went out of [the room]385-the room , and [I]0-i heard [his]1427-i footsteps echoing in the distance on the way to [the chapel]2310-the chapel .

Left alone with [the Prince]708-the prince , [I]0-i snatched a glass of cold water from the table , and sprinkled some of it on [his]1427-i forehead and hands . This was quite sufficient to revive [him]1427-i ; and [he]1427-i drew a long breath , opened [his]1427-i eyes , and stared wildly about [him]1427-i . Seeing [no one]1820-no one but [me]0-i [he]1427-i grew bewildered , and asked :

" What has happened ? "[1427-i]

Then catching sight of the drawn swords lying still on the ground where they had been thrown , [he]1427-i sprang to [his]1427-i feet , and cried :

" Where is [the coward and murderer]3373-the coward and murderer ? "[1427-i]

[I]0-i made [him]1427-i sit down and hear with patience what [I]0-i had to say . [I]0-i told [him]1427-i plainly that [Zara]152-zara had expected [her]152-zara death , and had prepared for it - had even bade [me]0-i good - bye , although then [I]0-i had not understood the meaning of [her]152-zara words . [I]0-i recalled to [his]1427-i mind the day when [Zara]152-zara had used [her]152-zara power to repulse [him]1427-i .

" Disbelieve as [you]1427-i will in electric spiritual force , "[0-i] [I]0-i said . " [Your]1427-i message to [her]152-zara then through [me]0-i was - TELL [HER]152-zara [I]0-i HAVE SEEN [[HER]152-zara LOVER]2633-her lover . "[0-i]

At these words a sombre shadow flitted over [the Prince]708-the prince 's face .

" [I]1427-i tell [you]0-i , "[1427-i] [he]1427-i said slowly , " that [I]1427-i believe [I]1427-i was on that occasion [the victim of an hallucination]3375-the victim of an hallucination . [A superb figure]3376-a superb figure , like , and yet unlike , [a man , but of a much larger and grander form]3377-a man , but of a much larger and grander form , appeared to [me]1427-i , as [I]1427-i thought , and spoke . ' [Zara]152-zara is [mine]1427-i , ' it said - ' mine by choice ; mine by freewill ; mine till death ; mine after death ; mine through eternity . With [her]152-zara [thou]3378-thou hast naught in common ; [thy]3378-thou way lies elsewhere . Follow the path allotted to [thee]0-i , and presume no more upon [an angel]284-an angel 's patience . ' Then this Strange majestic - looking creature , whose face , as [I]1427-i remember it , was extraordinarily beautiful , and whose eyes were like self - luminous stars , vanished . But , after all , what of it ? The whole thing was a dream . "[1427-i]

" [I]0-i am not so sure of that , "[0-i] [I]0-i said quietly , " But , [Prince Ivan]153-prince ivan , now that [you]1435-you are calmer and more capable of resignation , will [you]1435-you tell [me]0-i why [you]1435-you loved [Zara]152-zara ? "[0-i]

" Why ! "[1435-you] [he]1435-you broke out impetuously . " Why , because it was impossible to help loving [her]152-zara . "[1435-you]

" That is no answer , "[0-i] [I]0-i replied . " Think ! [You]1435-you can reason well if [you]1435-you like - [I]0-i have heard [you]1435-you hold [your]1435-you own in an argument . What made [you]1435-you love [Zara]152-zara ? "[0-i]

[He]1435-you looked at [me]0-i in a sort of impatient surprise , but seeing [I]0-i was very much in earnest , [he]1435-you pondered a minute or so before replying .

" [She]152-zara was [the loveliest woman [I]1435-you have ever seen]3380-the loveliest woman i have ever seen ! "[1435-you] [he]1435-you said at last , and in [his]1435-you voice there was a sound of yearning and regret .

" Is THAT all ? "[0-i] [I]0-i queried , with a gesture of contempt . " Because [her]152-zara body was beautiful - because [she]152-zara had sweet kissing lips and a soft skin ; because [her]152-zara hand was like a white flower , and [her]152-zara dark hair clustering over [her]152-zara brow reminded one of a misty evening cloud hiding moonlight ; because the glance of [her]152-zara glorious eyes made the blood leap through [your]1435-you veins and sting [you]1435-you with passionate desire - are these the reasons of [your]1435-you so - called love ? Oh , give it some other and lower name ! For the worms shall feed on the fair flesh that won [your]1435-you admiration - [their]3381-their wet and slimy bodies shall trail across the round white arms and tender bosom - unsightly things shall crawl among the tresses of the glossy hair ; and nothing , nothing shall remain of what [you]1435-you loved , but dust . [Prince Ivan]153-prince ivan , [you]1435-you shudder ; but [I]0-i too loved [Zara]152-zara - [I]0-i loved [HER]152-zara , not the perishable casket in which , like a jewel , [she]152-zara was for a time enshrined . [I]0-i love [her]152-zara still - and for the being [I]0-i love there is no such thing as death . "[0-i]

[The Prince]708-the prince was silent , and seemed touched . [I]0-i had spoken with real feeling , and tears of emotion stood in [my]0-i eyes .

" [I]708-the prince loved [her]152-zara as [a man]278-a man generally loves , "[708-the prince] [he]708-the prince said , after a little pause . " Nay - more than [most men]3383-most men love [most women]2582-most women ! "[708-the prince]

" [Most men]3383-most men are too often selfish in both [their]3383-most men loves and hatreds , "[0-i] [I]0-i returned . " No , [I]708-the prince confess [I]708-the prince had not , "[708-the prince] [he]708-the prince answered readily . " [I]708-the prince considered [her]152-zara to be entirely a victim to [[her]152-zara brother]703-her brother 's scientific experiments . "[708-the prince]

[I]0-i smiled with a little scorn .

" [Your]708-the prince presumption was almost greater than [your]708-the prince folly , [Prince]2309-prince , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , " that with such ideas as these in [your]708-the prince mind [you]708-the prince could dream of winning [Zara]152-zara for [a wife]3390-a wife . And [I]0-i beckoned [him]1437-you towards the door . [He]1437-you hesitated .

And [he]1437-you covered [his]1437-you eyes with [his]1437-you hand - [I]0-i saw tears slowly drop through [his]1437-you fingers . [I]0-i gazed at [him]1437-you , half in wonder , half in pity .

" And yet [you]1437-you are [a brave man]3393-a brave man ! "[0-i] [I]0-i said .

These words roused [him]1437-you . [He]1437-you met [my]0-i gaze with such a haggard look of woe that [my]0-i heart ached for [him]1437-you . What comfort had [he]1437-you now ? What joy could [he]1437-you ever expect ? All [his]1437-you happiness was centred in the fact of BEING ALIVE - alive to the pleasures of living , and to the joys [the world]264-the world could offer to [a man who was strong , handsome , rich , and accomplished]1439-a man who was strong , handsome , rich , and accomplished - how could [he]1437-you look upon death as otherwise than a loathsome thing - a thing not to be thought of in the heyday of youthful blood and jollity - [a doleful spectre]1440-a doleful spectre , in whose bony hands the roses of love must fall and wither ! With a sense of deep commiseration in [me]0-i , [I]0-i spoke again with great gentleness .

" [You]1437-you need not look upon [Zara]152-zara 's corpse unless [you]1437-you wish it , [Prince]153-prince ivan , "[0-i] [I]0-i said . " To [you]1437-you , the mysteries of the Hereafter have not been unlocked , because there is something in [your]1437-you nature that can not and will not believe in [God]101-god . Therefore to [you]1437-you , death must be repellent . [I]0-i know [you]1437-you are one of [those for whom the present alone exists]3394-those for whom the present alone exists - [you]1437-you easily forget the past , and take no trouble for the future . [Paris]5-paris is [[your]1437-you heaven]3395-your heaven , or [St. Petersburg]24-st. petersburg , or [Vienna]79-vienna , as the fancy takes [you]1437-you ; and the modern atheistical doctrines of French demoralization are in [your]1437-you blood . Nothing but a heaven - sent miracle could make [you]1437-you other than [you]1437-you are , and miracles do not exist for [the materialist]3396-the materialist . But let [me]0-i say two words more before [you]1437-you go from [this house]2603-this house . Seek no more to avenge [yourself]1437-you for [your]1437-you love - disappointment on [Heliobas]104-heliobas - for [you]1437-you have really nothing to avenge . By [your]1437-you own confession [you]1437-you only cared for [Zara]152-zara 's body - that body was always perishable , and it has perished by a sudden but natural catastrophe . With [her]152-zara soul , [you]1437-you declare [you]1437-you had nothing in common - that was [herself]152-zara - and [she]152-zara is alive to [us]3398-us who love [her]152-zara as [she]152-zara sought to be loved . [Heliobas]104-heliobas is innocent of having slain [her]152-zara body ; [he]104-heliobas but helped to cultivate and foster that beautiful Spirit which [he]104-heliobas knew to be [HER]152-zara - for that [he]104-heliobas is to be honored and commended . Promise [me]0-i , therefore , [Prince Ivan]153-prince ivan , that [you]1437-you will never approach [him]104-heliobas again except in friendship - indeed , [you]1437-you owe [him]104-heliobas an apology for [your]1437-you unjust accusation , as also [your]1437-you gratitude for [his]104-heliobas sparing [your]1437-you life in the recent struggle . "[0-i]

[The Prince]708-the prince kept [his]708-the prince eyes steadily fixed upon [me]0-i all the time [I]0-i was speaking , and as [I]0-i finished , [he]708-the prince sighed and moved restlessly .

" [Your]0-i words are compelling , [mademoiselle]1745-mademoiselle , "[708-the prince] [he]708-the prince said ; " and [you]0-i have a strange attraction for [me]708-the prince .
